dn16:1.1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
dn16:1.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto vajji abhiyatukamo hoti.
dn16:1.1.5: “aham hime vajji evammahiddhike evammahanubhave ucchecchami vajji, vinasessami vajji, anayabyasanam apadessami”ti.
dn16:1.2.1: Atha kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto vassakaram brahmanam magadhamahamattam amantesi:
dn16:1.2.2: “ehi tvam, brahmana, yena bhagava tenupasankama; upasankamitva mama vacanena bhagavato pade sirasa vandahi, appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam puccha:
dn16:1.2.3: ‘raja, bhante, magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto bhagavato pade sirasa vandati, appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam pucchati’ti.
dn16:1.2.5: ‘raja, bhante, magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto vajji abhiyatukamo.
dn16:1.2.7: “aham hime vajji evammahiddhike evammahanubhave ucchecchami vajji, vinasessami vajji, anayabyasanam apadessami”’ti.
dn16:1.2.8: Yatha te bhagava byakaroti, tam sadhukam uggahetva mama aroceyyasi.
dn16:1.3.1: “Evam, bho”ti kho vassakaro brahmano magadhamahamatto ranno magadhassa ajatasattussa vedehiputtassa patissutva bhaddani bhaddani yanani yojetva bhaddam bhaddam yanam abhiruhitva bhaddehi bhaddehi yanehi rajagahamha niyyasi, yena gijjhakuto pabbato tena payasi.
dn16:1.3.2: Yavatika yanassa bhumi, yanena gantva, yana paccorohitva pattikova yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
dn16:1.3.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho vassakaro brahmano magadhamahamatto bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:1.3.4: “raja, bho gotama, magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto bhoto gotamassa pade sirasa vandati, appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam pucchati.
dn16:1.3.5: Raja, bho gotama, magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto vajji abhiyatukamo.
dn16:1.3.7: ‘aham hime vajji evammahiddhike evammahanubhave ucchecchami vajji, vinasessami vajji, anayabyasanam apadessami’”ti.
dn16:1.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma anando bhagavato pitthito thito hoti bhagavantam bijayamano.
dn16:1.4.2: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:1.4.3: “kinti te, ananda, sutam, ‘vajji abhinham sannipata sannipatabahula’”ti?
dn16:1.4.5: “Yavakivanca, ananda, vajji abhinham sannipata sannipatabahula bhavissanti, vuddhiyeva, ananda, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.4.6: Kinti te, ananda, sutam, ‘vajji samagga sannipatanti, samagga vutthahanti, samagga vajjikaraniyani karonti’”ti?
dn16:1.4.7: “Sutam metam, bhante: ‘vajji samagga sannipatanti, samagga vutthahanti, samagga vajjikaraniyani karonti’”ti.
dn16:1.4.8: “Yavakivanca, ananda, vajji samagga sannipatissanti, samagga vutthahissanti, samagga vajjikaraniyani karissanti, vuddhiyeva, ananda, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.4.9: Kinti te, ananda, sutam, ‘vajji apannattam na pannapenti, pannattam na samucchindanti, yathapannatte porane vajjidhamme samadaya vattanti’”ti?
dn16:1.4.10: “Sutam metam, bhante: ‘vajji apannattam na pannapenti, pannattam na samucchindanti, yathapannatte porane vajjidhamme samadaya vattanti’”ti.
dn16:1.4.11: “Yavakivanca, ananda, vajji apannattam na pannapessanti, pannattam na samucchindissanti, yathapannatte porane vajjidhamme samadaya vattissanti, vuddhiyeva, ananda, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.4.12: Kinti te, ananda, sutam, ‘vajji ye te vajjinam vajjimahallaka, te sakkaronti garum karonti manenti pujenti, tesanca sotabbam mannanti’”ti?
dn16:1.4.13: “Sutam metam, bhante: ‘vajji ye te vajjinam vajjimahallaka, te sakkaronti garum karonti manenti pujenti, tesanca sotabbam mannanti’”ti.
dn16:1.4.14: “Yavakivanca, ananda, vajji ye te vajjinam vajjimahallaka, te sakkarissanti garum karissanti manessanti pujessanti, tesanca sotabbam mannissanti, vuddhiyeva, ananda, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.4.15: Kinti te, ananda, sutam, ‘vajji ya ta kulitthiyo kulakumariyo, ta na okkassa pasayha vasenti’”ti?
dn16:1.4.16: “Sutam metam, bhante: ‘vajji ya ta kulitthiyo kulakumariyo ta na okkassa pasayha vasenti’”ti.
dn16:1.4.17: “Yavakivanca, ananda, vajji ya ta kulitthiyo kulakumariyo, ta na okkassa pasayha vasessanti, vuddhiyeva, ananda, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.4.18: Kinti te, ananda, sutam, ‘vajji yani tani vajjinam vajjicetiyani abbhantarani ceva bahirani ca, tani sakkaronti garum karonti manenti pujenti, tesanca dinnapubbam katapubbam dhammikam balim no parihapenti’”ti?
dn16:1.4.19: “Sutam metam, bhante: ‘vajji yani tani vajjinam vajjicetiyani abbhantarani ceva bahirani ca, tani sakkaronti garum karonti manenti pujenti tesanca dinnapubbam katapubbam dhammikam balim no parihapenti’”ti.
dn16:1.4.20: “Yavakivanca, ananda, vajji yani tani vajjinam vajjicetiyani abbhantarani ceva bahirani ca, tani sakkarissanti garum karissanti manessanti pujessanti, tesanca dinnapubbam katapubbam dhammikam balim no parihapessanti, vuddhiyeva, ananda, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.4.21: Kinti te, ananda, sutam, ‘vajjinam arahantesu dhammika rakkhavaranagutti susamvihita, kinti anagata ca arahanto vijitam agaccheyyum, agata ca arahanto vijite phasu vihareyyun’”ti?
dn16:1.4.22: “Sutam metam, bhante ‘vajjinam arahantesu dhammika rakkhavaranagutti susamvihita kinti anagata ca arahanto vijitam agaccheyyum, agata ca arahanto vijite phasu vihareyyun’”ti.
dn16:1.4.23: “Yavakivanca, ananda, vajjinam arahantesu dhammika rakkhavaranagutti susamvihita bhavissati, kinti anagata ca arahanto vijitam agaccheyyum, agata ca arahanto vijite phasu vihareyyunti. Vuddhiyeva, ananda, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani”ti.
dn16:1.5.1: Atha kho bhagava vassakaram brahmanam magadhamahamattam amantesi:
dn16:1.5.2: “ekamidaham, brahmana, samayam vesaliyam viharami sarandade cetiye.
dn16:1.5.3: Tatraham vajjinam ime satta aparihaniye dhamme desesim.
dn16:1.5.4: Yavakivanca, brahmana, ime satta aparihaniya dhamma vajjisu thassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu vajji sandississanti, vuddhiyeva, brahmana, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani”ti.
dn16:1.5.5: Evam vutte, vassakaro brahmano magadhamahamatto bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:1.5.6: “ekamekenapi, bho gotama, aparihaniyena dhammena samannagatanam vajjinam vuddhiyeva patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.5.7: Ko pana vado sattahi aparihaniyehi dhammehi.
dn16:1.5.8: Akaraniyava, bho gotama, vajji ranna magadhena ajatasattuna vedehiputtena yadidam yuddhassa, annatra upalapanaya annatra mithubheda.
dn16:1.5.9: Handa ca dani mayam, bho gotama, gacchama, bahukicca mayam bahukaraniya”ti.
dn16:1.5.11: Atha kho vassakaro brahmano magadhamahamatto bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana pakkami.
dn16:1.6.1: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkante vassakare brahmane magadhamahamatte ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:1.6.2: “gaccha tvam, ananda, yavatika bhikkhu rajagaham upanissaya viharanti, te sabbe upatthanasalayam sannipatehi”ti.
dn16:1.6.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva yavatika bhikkhu rajagaham upanissaya viharanti, te sabbe upatthanasalayam sannipatetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:1.6.4: “sannipatito, bhante, bhikkhusangho, yassadani, bhante, bhagava kalam mannati”ti.
dn16:1.6.5: Atha kho bhagava utthayasana yena upatthanasala tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
dn16:1.6.9: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
dn16:1.6.11: “Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhinham sannipata sannipatabahula bhavissanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.6.12: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samagga sannipatissanti, samagga vutthahissanti, samagga sanghakaraniyani karissanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.6.13: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu apannattam na pannapessanti, pannattam na samucchindissanti, yathapannattesu sikkhapadesu samadaya vattissanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.6.14: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhu thera rattannu cirapabbajita sanghapitaro sanghaparinayaka, te sakkarissanti garum karissanti manessanti pujessanti, tesanca sotabbam mannissanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.6.15: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaya tanhaya ponobbhavikaya na vasam gacchissanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.6.16: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannakesu senasanesu sapekkha bhavissanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.6.17: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccattanneva satim upatthapessanti: ‘kinti anagata ca pesala sabrahmacari agaccheyyum, agata ca pesala sabrahmacari phasu vihareyyun’ti. Vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.6.18: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihaniya dhamma bhikkhusu thassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu bhikkhu sandississanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.7.1: Aparepi vo, bhikkhave, satta aparihaniye dhamme desessami, tam sunatha, sadhukam manasikarotha, bhasissami”ti.
dn16:1.7.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
dn16:1.7.4: “Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na kammarama bhavissanti na kammarata na kammaramatamanuyutta, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.7.5: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na bhassarama bhavissanti na bhassarata na bhassaramatamanuyutta, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.7.6: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na niddarama bhavissanti na niddarata na niddaramatamanuyutta, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.7.7: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na sanganikarama bhavissanti na sanganikarata na sanganikaramatamanuyutta, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.7.8: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na papiccha bhavissanti na papikanam icchanam vasam gata, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.7.9: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na papamitta bhavissanti na papasahaya na papasampavanka, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.7.10: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na oramattakena visesadhigamena antaravosanam apajjissanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.8.1: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihaniya dhamma bhikkhusu thassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu bhikkhu sandississanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.8.2: Aparepi vo, bhikkhave, satta aparihaniye dhamme desessami …pe….
dn16:1.8.9: pannavanto bhavissanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.8.10: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihaniya dhamma bhikkhusu thassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu bhikkhu sandississanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.8.11: Aparepi vo, bhikkhave, satta aparihaniye dhamme desessami, tam sunatha, sadhukam manasikarotha, bhasissami”ti.
dn16:1.8.12: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
dn16:1.9.7: upekkhasambojjhangam bhavessanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.10.1: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihaniya dhamma bhikkhusu thassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu bhikkhu sandississanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha no parihani.
dn16:1.10.2: Aparepi vo, bhikkhave, satta aparihaniye dhamme desessami, tam sunatha, sadhukam manasikarotha, bhasissami”ti.
dn16:1.10.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
dn16:1.10.11: nirodhasannam bhavessanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.10.12: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihaniya dhamma bhikkhusu thassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu bhikkhu sandississanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.11.1: Cha vo, bhikkhave, aparihaniye dhamme desessami, tam sunatha, sadhukam manasikarotha, bhasissami”ti.
dn16:1.11.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
dn16:1.11.4: “Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettam kayakammam paccupatthapessanti sabrahmacarisu avi ceva raho ca, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.11.5: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettam vacikammam paccupatthapessanti …pe…
dn16:1.11.6: mettam manokammam paccupatthapessanti sabrahmacarisu avi ceva raho ca, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.11.7: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu, ye te labha dhammika dhammaladdha antamaso pattapariyapannamattampi tatharupehi labhehi appativibhattabhogi bhavissanti silavantehi sabrahmacarihi sadharanabhogi, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.11.8: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yani tani silani akhandani acchiddani asabalani akammasani bhujissani vinnupasatthani aparamatthani samadhisamvattanikani tatharupesu silesu silasamannagata viharissanti sabrahmacarihi avi ceva raho ca, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.11.9: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yayam ditthi ariya niyyanika, niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya, tatharupaya ditthiya ditthisamannagata viharissanti sabrahmacarihi avi ceva raho ca, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
dn16:1.11.10: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, ime cha aparihaniya dhamma bhikkhusu thassanti, imesu ca chasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu bhikkhu sandississanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani”ti.
dn16:1.12.1: Tatra sudam bhagava rajagahe viharanto gijjhakute pabbate etadeva bahulam bhikkhunam dhammim katham karoti:
dn16:1.12.5: Pannaparibhavitam cittam sammadeva asavehi vimuccati, seyyathidam—
dn16:1.13.1: Atha kho bhagava rajagahe yathabhirantam viharitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:1.13.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:1.13.4: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena ambalatthika tadavasari.
dn16:1.14.1: Tatra sudam bhagava ambalatthikayam viharati rajagarake.
dn16:1.14.2: Tatrapi sudam bhagava ambalatthikayam viharanto rajagarake etadeva bahulam bhikkhunam dhammim katham karoti:
dn16:1.14.6: Pannaparibhavitam cittam sammadeva asavehi vimuccati, seyyathidam—
dn16:1.15.1: Atha kho bhagava ambalatthikayam yathabhirantam viharitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:1.15.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:1.15.4: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena nalanda tadavasari,
dn16:1.15.5: tatra sudam bhagava nalandayam viharati pavarikambavane.
dn16:1.16.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:1.16.3: na cahu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati anno samano va brahmano va bhagavata bhiyyobhinnataro yadidam sambodhiyan”ti.
dn16:1.16.4: “Ulara kho te ayam, sariputta, asabhi vaca bhasita, ekamso gahito, sihanado nadito:
dn16:1.16.6: na cahu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati anno samano va brahmano va bhagavata bhiyyobhinnataro yadidam sambodhiyan’ti.
dn16:1.16.7: Kim te, sariputta, ye te ahesum atitamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha, sabbe te bhagavanto cetasa ceto paricca vidita:
dn16:1.16.8: ‘evamsila te bhagavanto ahesum itipi, evamdhamma evampanna evamvihari evamvimutta te bhagavanto ahesum itipi’”ti?
dn16:1.16.10: “Kim pana te, sariputta, ye te bhavissanti anagatamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha, sabbe te bhagavanto cetasa ceto paricca vidita:
dn16:1.16.11: ‘evamsila te bhagavanto bhavissanti itipi, evamdhamma evampanna evamvihari evamvimutta te bhagavanto bhavissanti itipi’”ti?
dn16:1.16.13: “Kim pana te, sariputta, aham etarahi araham sammasambuddho cetasa ceto paricca vidito:
dn16:1.16.14: ‘evamsilo bhagava itipi, evamdhammo evampanno evamvihari evamvimutto bhagava itipi’”ti?
dn16:1.16.16: “Ettha ca hi te, sariputta, atitanagatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammasambuddhesu cetopariyananam natthi.
dn16:1.16.17: Atha kincarahi te ayam, sariputta, ulara asabhi vaca bhasita, ekamso gahito, sihanado nadito:
dn16:1.16.18: ‘evampasanno aham, bhante, bhagavati; na cahu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati anno samano va brahmano va bhagavata bhiyyobhinnataro yadidam sambodhiyan’”ti?
dn16:1.17.1: “Na kho me, bhante, atitanagatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammasambuddhesu cetopariyananam atthi,
dn16:1.17.3: Seyyathapi, bhante, ranno paccantimam nagaram dalhuddhapam dalhapakaratoranam ekadvaram,
dn16:1.17.4: tatrassa dovariko pandito viyatto medhavi annatanam nivareta natanam paveseta.
dn16:1.17.5: So tassa nagarassa samanta anupariyayapatham anukkamamano na passeyya pakarasandhim va pakaravivaram va, antamaso bilaranikkhamanamattampi.
dn16:1.17.7: ‘ye kho keci olarika pana imam nagaram pavisanti va nikkhamanti va, sabbe te iminava dvarena pavisanti va nikkhamanti va’ti.
dn16:1.17.8: Evameva kho me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito:
dn16:1.17.9: ‘ye te, bhante, ahesum atitamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha, sabbe te bhagavanto panca nivarane pahaya cetaso upakkilese pannaya dubbalikarane catusu satipatthanesu supatitthitacitta sattabojjhange yathabhutam bhavetva anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambujjhimsu.
dn16:1.17.10: Yepi te, bhante, bhavissanti anagatamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha, sabbe te bhagavanto panca nivarane pahaya cetaso upakkilese pannaya dubbalikarane catusu satipatthanesu supatitthitacitta satta bojjhange yathabhutam bhavetva anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambujjhissanti.
dn16:1.17.11: Bhagavapi, bhante, etarahi araham sammasambuddho panca nivarane pahaya cetaso upakkilese pannaya dubbalikarane catusu satipatthanesu supatitthitacitto satta bojjhange yathabhutam bhavetva anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’”ti.
dn16:1.18.1: Tatrapi sudam bhagava nalandayam viharanto pavarikambavane etadeva bahulam bhikkhunam dhammim katham karoti:
dn16:1.18.5: Pannaparibhavitam cittam sammadeva asavehi vimuccati, seyyathidam—
dn16:1.19.1: Atha kho bhagava nalandayam yathabhirantam viharitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:1.19.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:1.19.4: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena pataligamo tadavasari.
dn16:1.20.1: Assosum kho pataligamika upasaka: “bhagava kira pataligamam anuppatto”ti.
dn16:1.20.2: Atha kho pataligamika upasaka yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho pataligamika upasaka bhagavantam etadavocum:
dn16:1.21.1: Atha kho pataligamika upasaka bhagavato adhivasanam viditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yena avasathagaram tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva sabbasantharim avasathagaram santharitva asanani pannapetva udakamanikam patitthapetva telapadipam aropetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu, upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho pataligamika upasaka bhagavantam etadavocum:
dn16:1.21.2: “sabbasantharisanthatam, bhante, avasathagaram, asanani pannattani, udakamaniko patitthapito, telapadipo aropito;
dn16:1.22.1: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya saddhim bhikkhusanghena yena avasathagaram tenupasankami; upasankamitva pade pakkhaletva avasathagaram pavisitva majjhimam thambham nissaya puratthabhimukho nisidi.
dn16:1.22.2: Bhikkhusanghopi kho pade pakkhaletva avasathagaram pavisitva pacchimam bhittim nissaya puratthabhimukho nisidi bhagavantameva purakkhatva.
dn16:1.22.3: Pataligamikapi kho upasaka pade pakkhaletva avasathagaram pavisitva puratthimam bhittim nissaya pacchimabhimukha nisidimsu bhagavantameva purakkhatva.
dn16:1.23.1: Atha kho bhagava pataligamike upasake amantesi:
dn16:1.23.4: Idha, gahapatayo, dussilo silavipanno pamadadhikaranam mahatim bhogajanim nigacchati.
dn16:1.23.6: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, dussilassa silavipannassa papako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
dn16:1.23.8: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, dussilo silavipanno yannadeva parisam upasankamati—yadi khattiyaparisam yadi brahmanaparisam yadi gahapatiparisam yadi samanaparisam—avisarado upasankamati mankubhuto.
dn16:1.23.10: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, dussilo silavipanno sammulho kalam karoti.
dn16:1.23.12: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, dussilo silavipanno kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
dn16:1.23.14: Ime kho, gahapatayo, panca adinava dussilassa silavipattiya.
dn16:1.24.3: Idha, gahapatayo, silava silasampanno appamadadhikaranam mahantam bhogakkhandham adhigacchati.
dn16:1.24.5: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, silavato silasampannassa kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
dn16:1.24.7: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, silava silasampanno yannadeva parisam upasankamati—yadi khattiyaparisam yadi brahmanaparisam yadi gahapatiparisam yadi samanaparisam visarado upasankamati amankubhuto.
dn16:1.24.9: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, silava silasampanno asammulho kalam karoti.
dn16:1.24.11: Puna caparam, gahapatayo, silava silasampanno kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
dn16:1.24.13: Ime kho, gahapatayo, panca anisamsa silavato silasampadaya”ti.
dn16:1.25.1: Atha kho bhagava pataligamike upasake bahudeva rattim dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva uyyojesi:
dn16:1.25.2: “abhikkanta kho, gahapatayo, ratti, yassadani tumhe kalam mannatha”ti.
dn16:1.25.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho pataligamika upasaka bhagavato patissutva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkamimsu.
dn16:1.25.4: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkantesu pataligamikesu upasakesu sunnagaram pavisi.
dn16:1.26.1: Tena kho pana samayena sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta pataligame nagaram mapenti vajjinam patibahaya.
dn16:1.26.2: Tena samayena sambahula devatayo sahasseva pataligame vatthuni parigganhanti.
dn16:1.26.3: Yasmim padese mahesakkha devata vatthuni parigganhanti, mahesakkhanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
dn16:1.27.1: Yasmim padese majjhima devata vatthuni parigganhanti, majjhimanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
dn16:1.27.2: Yasmim padese nica devata vatthuni parigganhanti, nicanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
dn16:1.27.3: Addasa kho bhagava dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena ta devatayo sahasseva pataligame vatthuni parigganhantiyo.
dn16:1.27.4: Atha kho bhagava rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:1.27.5: “Ke nu kho, ananda, pataligame nagaram mapenti”ti?
dn16:1.27.6: “Sunidhavassakara, bhante, magadhamahamatta pataligame nagaram mapenti vajjinam patibahaya”ti.
dn16:1.28.2: evameva kho, ananda, sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta pataligame nagaram mapenti vajjinam patibahaya.
dn16:1.28.3: Idhaham, ananda, addasam dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena sambahula devatayo sahasseva pataligame vatthuni parigganhantiyo.
dn16:1.28.4: Yasmim, ananda, padese mahesakkha devata vatthuni parigganhanti, mahesakkhanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
dn16:1.28.5: Yasmim padese majjhima devata vatthuni parigganhanti, majjhimanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
dn16:1.28.6: Yasmim padese nica devata vatthuni parigganhanti, nicanam tattha rannam rajamahamattanam cittani namanti nivesanani mapetum.
dn16:1.28.7: Yavata, ananda, ariyam ayatanam yavata vanippatho idam agganagaram bhavissati pataliputtam putabhedanam.
dn16:1.28.8: Pataliputtassa kho, ananda, tayo antaraya bhavissanti—
dn16:1.28.9: aggito va udakato va mithubheda va”ti.
dn16:1.29.1: Atha kho sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodimsu,
dn16:1.29.2: sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam atthamsu, ekamantam thita kho sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta bhagavantam etadavocum:
dn16:1.29.3: “adhivasetu no bhavam gotamo ajjatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
dn16:1.30.1: Atha kho sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta bhagavato adhivasanam viditva yena sako avasatho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva sake avasathe panitam khadaniyam bhojaniyam patiyadapetva bhagavato kalam arocapesum:
dn16:1.30.3: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya saddhim bhikkhusanghena yena sunidhavassakaranam magadhamahamattanam avasatho tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
dn16:1.30.4: Atha kho sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta buddhappamukham bhikkhusangham panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesum sampavaresum.
dn16:1.30.5: Atha kho sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta bhagavantam bhuttavim onitapattapanim annataram nicam asanam gahetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
dn16:1.31.1: Ekamantam nisinne kho sunidhavassakare magadhamahamatte bhagava imahi gathahi anumodi:
dn16:1.31.14: Atha kho bhagava sunidhavassakare magadhamahamatte imahi gathahi anumoditva utthayasana pakkami.
dn16:1.32.1: Tena kho pana samayena sunidhavassakara magadhamahamatta bhagavantam pitthito pitthito anubandha honti:
dn16:1.32.2: “yenajja samano gotamo dvarena nikkhamissati, tam gotamadvaram nama bhavissati.
dn16:1.32.3: Yena titthena gangam nadim tarissati, tam gotamatittham nama bhavissati”ti.
dn16:1.32.4: Atha kho bhagava yena dvarena nikkhami, tam gotamadvaram nama ahosi.
dn16:1.32.5: Atha kho bhagava yena ganga nadi tenupasankami.
dn16:1.33.1: Tena kho pana samayena ganga nadi pura hoti samatittika kakapeyya.
dn16:1.33.2: Appekacce manussa navam pariyesanti, appekacce ulumpam pariyesanti, appekacce kullam bandhanti apara, param gantukama.
dn16:1.33.3: Atha kho bhagava—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—gangaya nadiya orimatire antarahito parimatire paccutthasi saddhim bhikkhusanghena.
dn16:1.34.1: Addasa kho bhagava te manusse appekacce navam pariyesante appekacce ulumpam pariyesante appekacce kullam bandhante apara param gantukame.
dn16:1.34.2: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
dn16:2.1.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:2.1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:2.1.4: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena kotigamo tadavasari.
dn16:2.2.2: “Catunnam, bhikkhave, ariyasaccanam ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca.
dn16:2.2.4: Dukkhassa, bhikkhave, ariyasaccassa ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca.
dn16:2.2.5: Dukkhasamudayassa, bhikkhave, ariyasaccassa ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca.
dn16:2.2.6: Dukkhanirodhassa, bhikkhave, ariyasaccassa ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca.
dn16:2.2.7: Dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya, bhikkhave, ariyasaccassa ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca.
dn16:2.2.8: Tayidam, bhikkhave, dukkham ariyasaccam anubuddham patividdham, dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam anubuddham patividdham, dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam anubuddham patividdham, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam anubuddham patividdham, ucchinna bhavatanha, khina bhavanetti, natthi dani punabbhavo”ti.
dn16:2.3.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
dn16:2.4.1: Tatrapi sudam bhagava kotigame viharanto etadeva bahulam bhikkhunam dhammim katham karoti:
dn16:2.4.5: Pannaparibhavitam cittam sammadeva asavehi vimuccati, seyyathidam—
dn16:2.5.1: Atha kho bhagava kotigame yathabhirantam viharitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:2.5.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:2.5.4: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena natika tadavasari.
dn16:2.5.5: Tatrapi sudam bhagava natike viharati ginjakavasathe.
dn16:2.6.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:2.6.2: “salho nama, bhante, bhikkhu natike kalankato, tassa ka gati, ko abhisamparayo?
dn16:2.6.3: Nanda nama, bhante, bhikkhuni natike kalankata, tassa ka gati, ko abhisamparayo?
dn16:2.6.4: Sudatto nama, bhante, upasako natike kalankato, tassa ka gati, ko abhisamparayo?
dn16:2.6.5: Sujata nama, bhante, upasika natike kalankata, tassa ka gati, ko abhisamparayo?
dn16:2.6.6: Kukkuto nama, bhante, upasako natike kalankato, tassa ka gati, ko abhisamparayo?
dn16:2.6.13: subhaddo nama, bhante, upasako natike kalankato, tassa ka gati, ko abhisamparayo”ti?
dn16:2.7.1: “Salho, ananda, bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
dn16:2.7.2: Nanda, ananda, bhikkhuni pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatika tattha parinibbayini anavattidhamma tasma loka.
dn16:2.7.3: Sudatto, ananda, upasako tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagami sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karissati.
dn16:2.7.4: Sujata, ananda, upasika tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanna avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana.
dn16:2.7.5: Kukkuto, ananda, upasako pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka.
dn16:2.7.12: subhaddo, ananda, upasako pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka.
dn16:2.7.13: Paropannasam, ananda, natike upasaka kalankata, pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatika tattha parinibbayino anavattidhamma tasma loka.
dn16:2.7.14: Sadhika navuti, ananda, natike upasaka kalankata tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagamino sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karissanti.
dn16:2.7.15: Satirekani, ananda, pancasatani natike upasaka kalankata, tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanna avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana.
dn16:2.8.1: Anacchariyam kho panetam, ananda, yam manussabhuto kalam kareyya.
dn16:2.8.2: Tasmimyeva kalankate tathagatam upasankamitva etamattham pucchissatha, vihesa hesa, ananda, tathagatassa.
dn16:2.8.3: Tasmatihananda, dhammadasam nama dhammapariyayam desessami, yena samannagato ariyasavako akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya:
dn16:2.8.4: ‘khinanirayomhi khinatiracchanayoni khinapettivisayo khinapayaduggativinipato, sotapannohamasmi avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano’ti.
dn16:2.9.1: Katamo ca so, ananda, dhammadaso dhammapariyayo, yena samannagato ariyasavako akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya:
dn16:2.9.2: ‘khinanirayomhi khinatiracchanayoni khinapettivisayo khinapayaduggativinipato, sotapannohamasmi avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano’ti?
dn16:2.9.3: Idhananda, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti:
dn16:2.9.4: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
dn16:2.9.6: ‘svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi’ti.
dn16:2.9.8: ‘suppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, ujuppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, nayappatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, samicippatipanno bhagavato savakasangho yadidam cattari purisayugani attha purisapuggala, esa bhagavato savakasangho ahuneyyo pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa’ti.
dn16:2.9.9: Ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammasehi bhujissehi vinnupasatthehi aparamatthehi samadhisamvattanikehi.
dn16:2.9.10: Ayam kho so, ananda, dhammadaso dhammapariyayo, yena samannagato ariyasavako akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya:
dn16:2.9.11: ‘khinanirayomhi khinatiracchanayoni khinapettivisayo khinapayaduggativinipato, sotapannohamasmi avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano’”ti.
dn16:2.10.1: Tatrapi sudam bhagava natike viharanto ginjakavasathe etadeva bahulam bhikkhunam dhammim katham karoti:
dn16:2.10.5: Pannaparibhavitam cittam sammadeva asavehi vimuccati, seyyathidam—
dn16:2.11.1: Atha kho bhagava natike yathabhirantam viharitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:2.11.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:2.11.4: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena vesali tadavasari.
dn16:2.11.5: Tatra sudam bhagava vesaliyam viharati ambapalivane.
dn16:2.12.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
dn16:2.12.8: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
dn16:2.12.9: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti.
dn16:2.13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante patikkante sampajanakari hoti, alokite vilokite sampajanakari hoti, saminjite pasarite sampajanakari hoti, sanghatipattacivaradharane sampajanakari hoti, asite pite khayite sayite sampajanakari hoti, uccarapassavakamme sampajanakari hoti, gate thite nisinne sutte jagarite bhasite tunhibhave sampajanakari hoti.
dn16:2.13.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajano hoti.
dn16:2.14.1: Assosi kho ambapali ganika: “bhagava kira vesalim anuppatto vesaliyam viharati mayham ambavane”ti.
dn16:2.14.2: Atha kho ambapali ganika bhaddani bhaddani yanani yojapetva bhaddam bhaddam yanam abhiruhitva bhaddehi bhaddehi yanehi vesaliya niyyasi. Yena sako aramo tena payasi.
dn16:2.14.3: Yavatika yanassa bhumi, yanena gantva, yana paccorohitva pattikava yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
dn16:2.14.4: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ambapalim ganikam bhagava dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi.
dn16:2.14.5: Atha kho ambapali ganika bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassita samadapita samuttejita sampahamsita bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:2.14.6: “adhivasetu me, bhante, bhagava svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
dn16:2.14.8: Atha kho ambapali ganika bhagavato adhivasanam viditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
dn16:2.15.1: Assosum kho vesalika licchavi: “bhagava kira vesalim anuppatto vesaliyam viharati ambapalivane”ti.
dn16:2.15.2: Atha kho te licchavi bhaddani bhaddani yanani yojapetva bhaddam bhaddam yanam abhiruhitva bhaddehi bhaddehi yanehi vesaliya niyyimsu.
dn16:2.15.3: Tatra ekacce licchavi nila honti nilavanna nilavattha nilalankara, ekacce licchavi pita honti pitavanna pitavattha pitalankara, ekacce licchavi lohita honti lohitavanna lohitavattha lohitalankara, ekacce licchavi odata honti odatavanna odatavattha odatalankara.
dn16:2.16.1: Atha kho ambapali ganika daharanam daharanam licchavinam akkhena akkham cakkena cakkam yugena yugam pativattesi.
dn16:2.16.2: Atha kho te licchavi ambapalim ganikam etadavocum:
dn16:2.16.3: “kim, je ambapali, daharanam daharanam licchavinam akkhena akkham cakkena cakkam yugena yugam pativattesi”ti?
dn16:2.16.4: “Tatha hi pana me, ayyaputta, bhagava nimantito svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
dn16:2.16.6: “Sacepi me, ayyaputta, vesalim saharam dassatha, evamaham tam bhattam na dassami”ti.
dn16:2.16.7: Atha kho te licchavi angulim photesum:
dn16:2.16.8: “jitamha vata bho ambakaya, jitamha vata bho ambakaya”ti.
dn16:2.16.9: Atha kho te licchavi yena ambapalivanam tena payimsu.
dn16:2.17.1: Addasa kho bhagava te licchavi duratova agacchante.
dn16:2.17.3: “yesam, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam deva tavatimsa aditthapubba, oloketha, bhikkhave, licchaviparisam;
dn16:2.18.1: Atha kho te licchavi yavatika yanassa bhumi, yanena gantva, yana paccorohitva pattikava yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
dn16:2.18.2: Ekamantam nisinne kho te licchavi bhagava dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi.
dn16:2.18.3: Atha kho te licchavi bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassita samadapita samuttejita sampahamsita bhagavantam etadavocum:
dn16:2.18.4: “adhivasetu no, bhante, bhagava svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
dn16:2.18.5: Atha kho bhagava te licchavi etadavoca:
dn16:2.18.6: “adhivuttham kho me, licchavi, svatanaya ambapaliya ganikaya bhattan”ti.
dn16:2.18.7: Atha kho te licchavi angulim photesum:
dn16:2.18.8: “jitamha vata bho ambakaya, jitamha vata bho ambakaya”ti.
dn16:2.18.9: Atha kho te licchavi bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkamimsu.
dn16:2.19.1: Atha kho ambapali ganika tassa rattiya accayena sake arame panitam khadaniyam bhojaniyam patiyadapetva bhagavato kalam arocapesi:
dn16:2.19.3: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya saddhim bhikkhusanghena yena ambapaliya ganikaya nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
dn16:2.19.4: Atha kho ambapali ganika buddhappamukham bhikkhusangham panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesi sampavaresi.
dn16:2.19.5: Atha kho ambapali ganika bhagavantam bhuttavim onitapattapanim annataram nicam asanam gahetva ekamantam nisidi.
dn16:2.19.6: Ekamantam nisinna kho ambapali ganika bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:2.19.9: Atha kho bhagava ambapalim ganikam dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva utthayasana pakkami.
dn16:2.20.1: Tatrapi sudam bhagava vesaliyam viharanto ambapalivane etadeva bahulam bhikkhunam dhammim katham karoti:
dn16:2.20.5: Pannaparibhavitam cittam sammadeva asavehi vimuccati, seyyathidam—
dn16:2.21.1: Atha kho bhagava ambapalivane yathabhirantam viharitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:2.21.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:2.21.4: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena veluvagamako tadavasari.
dn16:2.22.2: “etha tumhe, bhikkhave, samanta vesalim yathamittam yathasandittham yathasambhattam vassam upetha.
dn16:2.22.3: Aham pana idheva veluvagamake vassam upagacchami”ti.
dn16:2.22.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva samanta vesalim yathamittam yathasandittham yathasambhattam vassam upagacchimsu.
dn16:2.22.5: Bhagava pana tattheva veluvagamake vassam upagacchi.
dn16:2.23.1: Atha kho bhagavato vassupagatassa kharo abadho uppajji, balha vedana vattanti maranantika.
dn16:2.23.2: Ta sudam bhagava sato sampajano adhivasesi avihannamano.
dn16:2.23.4: “na kho metam patirupam, yvaham anamantetva upatthake anapaloketva bhikkhusangham parinibbayeyyam.
dn16:2.23.5: Yannunaham imam abadham viriyena patipanametva jivitasankharam adhitthaya vihareyyan”ti.
dn16:2.24.1: Atha kho bhagava tam abadham viriyena patipanametva jivitasankharam adhitthaya vihasi.
dn16:2.24.2: Atha kho bhagavato so abadho patippassambhi.
dn16:2.24.3: Atha kho bhagava gilana vutthito aciravutthito gelanna vihara nikkhamma viharapacchayayam pannatte asane nisidi.
dn16:2.24.4: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:2.24.5: “dittho me, bhante, bhagavato phasu; dittham me, bhante, bhagavato khamaniyam, api ca me, bhante, madhurakajato viya kayo, disapi me na pakkhayanti, dhammapi mam na patibhanti bhagavato gelannena.
dn16:2.24.6: Api ca me, bhante, ahosi kacideva assasamatta:
dn16:2.24.7: ‘na tava bhagava parinibbayissati, na yava bhagava bhikkhusangham arabbha kincideva udaharati’”ti.
dn16:2.25.2: Desito, ananda, maya dhammo anantaram abahiram karitva.
dn16:2.25.5: ‘aham bhikkhusangham pariharissami’ti va ‘mamuddesiko bhikkhusangho’ti va, so nuna, ananda, bhikkhusangham arabbha kincideva udahareyya.
dn16:2.25.6: Tathagatassa kho, ananda, na evam hoti:
dn16:2.25.8: Sakim, ananda, tathagato bhikkhusangham arabbha kincideva udaharissati.
dn16:2.25.9: Aham kho panananda, etarahi jinno vuddho mahallako addhagato vayo anuppatto.
dn16:2.25.12: evameva kho, ananda, vethamissakena manne tathagatassa kayo yapeti.
dn16:2.25.13: Yasmim, ananda, samaye tathagato sabbanimittanam amanasikara ekaccanam vedananam nirodha animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja viharati, phasutaro, ananda, tasmim samaye tathagatassa kayo hoti.
dn16:2.26.1: Tasmatihananda, attadipa viharatha attasarana anannasarana, dhammadipa dhammasarana anannasarana.
dn16:2.26.2: Kathancananda, bhikkhu attadipo viharati attasarano anannasarano, dhammadipo dhammasarano anannasarano?
dn16:2.26.3: Idhananda, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
dn16:2.26.6: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
dn16:2.26.7: Evam kho, ananda, bhikkhu attadipo viharati attasarano anannasarano, dhammadipo dhammasarano anannasarano.
dn16:2.26.8: Ye hi keci, ananda, etarahi va mama va accayena attadipa viharissanti attasarana anannasarana, dhammadipa dhammasarana anannasarana, tamatagge me te, ananda, bhikkhu bhavissanti ye keci sikkhakama”ti.

dn16:3.1.2: Vesaliyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:3.1.4: yena capalam cetiyam tenupasankamissama diva viharaya”ti.

dn16:3.3.2: Tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, so akankhamano, ananda, tathagato kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va”ti.

dn16:3.7.1: Atha kho maro papima acirapakkante ayasmante anande yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho maro papima bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:3.7.2: “parinibbatu dani, bhante, bhagava, parinibbatu sugato, parinibbanakalo dani, bhante, bhagavato.
dn16:3.7.3: Bhasita kho panesa, bhante, bhagavata vaca:
dn16:3.7.4: ‘na tavaham, papima, parinibbayissami, yava me bhikkhu na savaka bhavissanti viyatta vinita visarada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammanudhammappatipanna samicippatipanna anudhammacarino, sakam acariyakam uggahetva acikkhissanti desessanti pannapessanti patthapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttanikarissanti, uppannam parappavadam sahadhammena suniggahitam niggahetva sappatihariyam dhammam desessanti’ti.

dn16:3.8.2: Parinibbatu dani, bhante, bhagava, parinibbatu sugato, parinibbanakalo dani, bhante, bhagavato.

dn16:3.8.4: ‘na tavaham, papima, parinibbayissami, yava me bhikkhuniyo na savika bhavissanti viyatta vinita visarada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammanudhammappatipanna samicippatipanna anudhammacariniyo, sakam acariyakam uggahetva acikkhissanti desessanti pannapessanti patthapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttanikarissanti, uppannam parappavadam sahadhammena suniggahitam niggahetva sappatihariyam dhammam desessanti’ti.

dn16:3.8.16: ‘na tavaham, papima, parinibbayissami, yava me idam brahmacariyam na iddhanceva bhavissati phitanca vittharikam bahujannam puthubhutam yava devamanussehi suppakasitan’ti.
dn16:3.8.17: Etarahi kho pana, bhante, bhagavato brahmacariyam iddhanceva phitanca vittharikam bahujannam puthubhutam, yava devamanussehi suppakasitam.
dn16:3.8.18: Parinibbatu dani, bhante, bhagava, parinibbatu sugato, parinibbanakalo dani, bhante, bhagavato”ti.
dn16:3.9.1: Evam vutte, bhagava maram papimantam etadavoca:
dn16:3.9.2: “appossukko tvam, papima, hohi, na ciram tathagatassa parinibbanam bhavissati.
dn16:3.9.3: Ito tinnam masanam accayena tathagato parinibbayissati”ti.
dn16:3.10.1: Atha kho bhagava capale cetiye sato sampajano ayusankharam ossaji.
dn16:3.10.2: Ossatthe ca bhagavata ayusankhare mahabhumicalo ahosi bhimsanako salomahamso, devadundubhiyo ca phalimsu.
dn16:3.10.3: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
dn16:3.11.2: “acchariyam vata bho, abbhutam vata bho, maha vatayam bhumicalo;
dn16:3.11.3: sumaha vatayam bhumicalo bhimsanako salomahamso; devadundubhiyo ca phalimsu.
dn16:3.11.4: Ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya”ti?
dn16:3.12.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami,
dn16:3.12.3: ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:3.12.6: sumaha vatayam, bhante, bhumicalo bhimsanako salomahamso; devadundubhiyo ca phalimsu.
dn16:3.12.7: Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya”ti?
dn16:3.13.1: “Attha kho ime, ananda, hetu, attha paccaya mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya.
dn16:3.13.3: Ayam, ananda, mahapathavi udake patitthita, udakam vate patitthitam, vato akasattho. Hoti kho so, ananda, samayo, yam mahavata vayanti. Mahavata vayanta udakam kampenti. Udakam kampitam pathavim kampeti.
dn16:3.13.4: Ayam pathamo hetu pathamo paccayo mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya.
dn16:3.14.1: Puna caparam, ananda, samano va hoti brahmano va iddhima cetovasippatto, devo va mahiddhiko mahanubhavo, tassa paritta pathavisanna bhavita hoti, appamana aposanna. So imam pathavim kampeti sankampeti sampakampeti sampavedheti.
dn16:3.14.2: Ayam dutiyo hetu dutiyo paccayo mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya.
dn16:3.15.1: Puna caparam, ananda, yada bodhisatto tusitakaya cavitva sato sampajano matukucchim okkamati, tadayam pathavi kampati sankampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
dn16:3.15.2: Ayam tatiyo hetu tatiyo paccayo mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya.
dn16:3.16.1: Puna caparam, ananda, yada bodhisatto sato sampajano matukucchisma nikkhamati, tadayam pathavi kampati sankampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
dn16:3.16.2: Ayam catuttho hetu catuttho paccayo mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya.
dn16:3.17.1: Puna caparam, ananda, yada tathagato anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambujjhati, tadayam pathavi kampati sankampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
dn16:3.17.2: Ayam pancamo hetu pancamo paccayo mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya.
dn16:3.18.1: Puna caparam, ananda, yada tathagato anuttaram dhammacakkam pavatteti, tadayam pathavi kampati sankampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
dn16:3.18.2: Ayam chattho hetu chattho paccayo mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya.
dn16:3.19.1: Puna caparam, ananda, yada tathagato sato sampajano ayusankharam ossajjati, tadayam pathavi kampati sankampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
dn16:3.19.2: Ayam sattamo hetu sattamo paccayo mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya.
dn16:3.20.1: Puna caparam, ananda, yada tathagato anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya parinibbayati, tadayam pathavi kampati sankampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
dn16:3.20.2: Ayam atthamo hetu atthamo paccayo mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya.
dn16:3.20.3: Ime kho, ananda, attha hetu, attha paccaya mahato bhumicalassa patubhavaya.

dn16:3.22.2: Tatrapi maya sannisinnapubbanceva sallapitapubbanca sakaccha ca samapajjitapubba.

dn16:3.29.3: Evameva ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati nilani nilavannani nilanidassanani nilanibhasani.
dn16:3.30.1: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati pitani pitavannani pitanidassanani pitanibhasani.
dn16:3.30.2: Seyyathapi nama kanikarapuppham pitam pitavannam pitanidassanam pitanibhasam. Seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham pitam pitavannam pitanidassanam pitanibhasam.
