dn16:3.33.9: Sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati,
dn16:3.33.11: Sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati,
dn16:3.33.13: Sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati,
dn16:3.33.15: Sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati,
dn16:3.33.17: Sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati,
dn16:3.34.1: Ekamidaham, ananda, samayam uruvelayam viharami najja neranjaraya tire ajapalanigrodhe pathamabhisambuddho.
dn16:3.34.2: Atha kho, ananda, maro papima yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho, ananda, maro papima mam etadavoca:
dn16:3.34.3: ‘parinibbatu dani, bhante, bhagava; parinibbatu sugato, parinibbanakalo dani, bhante, bhagavato’ti.
dn16:3.34.4: Evam vutte, aham, ananda, maram papimantam etadavocam:
dn16:3.35.1: ‘Na tavaham, papima, parinibbayissami, yava me bhikkhu na savaka bhavissanti viyatta vinita visarada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammanudhammappatipanna samicippatipanna anudhammacarino, sakam acariyakam uggahetva acikkhissanti desessanti pannapessanti patthapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttanikarissanti, uppannam parappavadam sahadhammena suniggahitam niggahetva sappatihariyam dhammam desessanti.
dn16:3.35.2: Na tavaham, papima, parinibbayissami, yava me bhikkhuniyo na savika bhavissanti viyatta vinita visarada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammanudhammappatipanna samicippatipanna anudhammacariniyo, sakam acariyakam uggahetva acikkhissanti desessanti pannapessanti patthapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttanikarissanti, uppannam parappavadam sahadhammena suniggahitam niggahetva sappatihariyam dhammam desessanti.
dn16:3.35.3: Na tavaham, papima, parinibbayissami, yava me upasaka na savaka bhavissanti viyatta vinita visarada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammanudhammappatipanna samicippatipanna anudhammacarino, sakam acariyakam uggahetva acikkhissanti desessanti pannapessanti patthapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttanikarissanti, uppannam parappavadam sahadhammena suniggahitam niggahetva sappatihariyam dhammam desessanti.
dn16:3.35.4: Na tavaham, papima, parinibbayissami, yava me upasika na savika bhavissanti viyatta vinita visarada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammanudhammappatipanna samicippatipanna anudhammacariniyo, sakam acariyakam uggahetva acikkhissanti desessanti pannapessanti patthapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttanikarissanti, uppannam parappavadam sahadhammena suniggahitam niggahetva sappatihariyam dhammam desessanti.
dn16:3.35.5: Na tavaham, papima, parinibbayissami, yava me idam brahmacariyam na iddhanceva bhavissati phitanca vittharikam bahujannam puthubhutam yava devamanussehi suppakasitan’ti.
dn16:3.36.1: Idaneva kho, ananda, ajja capale cetiye maro papima yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho, ananda, maro papima mam etadavoca:
dn16:3.36.2: ‘parinibbatu dani, bhante, bhagava, parinibbatu sugato, parinibbanakalo dani, bhante, bhagavato.
dn16:3.36.3: Bhasita kho panesa, bhante, bhagavata vaca:
dn16:3.36.4: “na tavaham, papima, parinibbayissami, yava me bhikkhu na savaka bhavissanti …pe…
dn16:3.36.5: yava me bhikkhuniyo na savika bhavissanti …pe…
dn16:3.36.6: yava me upasaka na savaka bhavissanti …pe…
dn16:3.36.7: yava me upasika na savika bhavissanti …pe…
dn16:3.36.8: yava me idam brahmacariyam na iddhanceva bhavissati phitanca vittharikam bahujannam puthubhutam, yava devamanussehi suppakasitan”ti.
dn16:3.36.9: Etarahi kho pana, bhante, bhagavato brahmacariyam iddhanceva phitanca vittharikam bahujannam puthubhutam, yava devamanussehi suppakasitam.
dn16:3.36.10: Parinibbatu dani, bhante, bhagava, parinibbatu sugato, parinibbanakalo dani, bhante, bhagavato’ti.
dn16:3.37.1: Evam vutte, aham, ananda, maram papimantam etadavocam:
dn16:3.37.2: ‘appossukko tvam, papima, hohi, na ciram tathagatassa parinibbanam bhavissati.
dn16:3.37.3: Ito tinnam masanam accayena tathagato parinibbayissati’ti.
dn16:3.37.4: Idaneva kho, ananda, ajja capale cetiye tathagatena satena sampajanena ayusankharo ossattho”ti.
dn16:3.38.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:3.38.2: “titthatu, bhante, bhagava kappam, titthatu sugato kappam bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan”ti.
dn16:3.38.4: Ma tathagatam yaci, akalo dani, ananda, tathagatam yacanaya”ti.
dn16:3.39.2: tatiyampi kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:3.39.3: “titthatu, bhante, bhagava kappam, titthatu sugato kappam bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan”ti.
dn16:3.39.6: “Atha kincarahi tvam, ananda, tathagatam yavatatiyakam abhinippilesi”ti?
dn16:3.40.1: “Sammukha metam, bhante, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
dn16:3.40.2: ‘yassa kassaci, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, so akankhamano kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va.
dn16:3.40.3: Tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha. So akankhamano, ananda, tathagato kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va’”ti.
dn16:3.40.6: “Tasmatihananda, tuyhevetam dukkatam, tuyhevetam aparaddham, yam tvam tathagatena evam olarike nimitte kayiramane olarike obhase kayiramane nasakkhi pativijjhitum, na tathagatam yaci:
dn16:3.40.7: ‘titthatu, bhante, bhagava kappam, titthatu sugato kappam bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan’ti.
dn16:3.40.8: Sace tvam, ananda, tathagatam yaceyyasi, dveva te vaca tathagato patikkhipeyya, atha tatiyakam adhivaseyya.
dn16:3.41.1: Ekamidaham, ananda, samayam rajagahe viharami gijjhakute pabbate.
dn16:3.41.3: ‘ramaniyam, ananda, rajagaham, ramaniyo, ananda, gijjhakuto pabbato.
dn16:3.41.4: Yassa kassaci, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, so akankhamano kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va.
dn16:3.41.5: Tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, so akankhamano, ananda, tathagato kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va’ti.
dn16:3.41.6: Evampi kho tvam, ananda, tathagatena olarike nimitte kayiramane olarike obhase kayiramane nasakkhi pativijjhitum, na tathagatam yaci:
dn16:3.41.7: ‘titthatu, bhante, bhagava kappam, titthatu sugato kappam bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan’ti.
dn16:3.41.8: Sace tvam, ananda, tathagatam yaceyyasi, dveva te vaca tathagato patikkhipeyya, atha tatiyakam adhivaseyya.
dn16:3.42.1: Ekamidaham, ananda, samayam tattheva rajagahe viharami gotamanigrodhe …pe…
dn16:3.43.2: ‘ramaniyam, ananda, rajagaham, ramaniyo gijjhakuto pabbato, ramaniyo gotamanigrodho, ramaniyo corapapato, ramaniya vebharapasse sattapanniguha, ramaniya isigilipasse kalasila, ramaniyo sitavane sappasondikapabbharo, ramaniyo tapodaramo, ramaniyo veluvane kalandakanivapo, ramaniyam jivakambavanam, ramaniyo maddakucchismim migadayo.
dn16:3.44.1: Yassa kassaci, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha …pe…
dn16:3.44.2: akankhamano, ananda, tathagato kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va’ti.
dn16:3.44.3: Evampi kho tvam, ananda, tathagatena olarike nimitte kayiramane olarike obhase kayiramane nasakkhi pativijjhitum, na tathagatam yaci:
dn16:3.44.4: ‘titthatu, bhante, bhagava kappam, titthatu sugato kappam bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan’ti.
dn16:3.44.5: Sace tvam, ananda, tathagatam yaceyyasi, dveva te vaca tathagato patikkhipeyya, atha tatiyakam adhivaseyya.
dn16:3.45.1: Ekamidaham, ananda, samayam idheva vesaliyam viharami udene cetiye.
dn16:3.45.4: Yassa kassaci, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, so akankhamano kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va.
dn16:3.45.5: Tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, so akankhamano, ananda, tathagato kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va’ti.
dn16:3.45.6: Evampi kho tvam, ananda, tathagatena olarike nimitte kayiramane olarike obhase kayiramane nasakkhi pativijjhitum, na tathagatam yaci:
dn16:3.45.7: ‘titthatu, bhante, bhagava kappam, titthatu sugato kappam bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan’ti.
dn16:3.45.8: Sace tvam, ananda, tathagatam yaceyyasi, dveva te vaca tathagato patikkhipeyya, atha tatiyakam adhivaseyya, tasmatihananda, tuyhevetam dukkatam, tuyhevetam aparaddham.
dn16:3.46.1: Ekamidaham, ananda, samayam idheva vesaliyam viharami gotamake cetiye …pe…
dn16:3.47.1: idaneva kho taham, ananda, ajja capale cetiye amantesim:
dn16:3.47.2: ‘ramaniya, ananda, vesali, ramaniyam udenam cetiyam, ramaniyam gotamakam cetiyam, ramaniyam sattambam cetiyam, ramaniyam bahuputtam cetiyam, ramaniyam sarandadam cetiyam, ramaniyam capalam cetiyam.
dn16:3.47.3: Yassa kassaci, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, so akankhamano kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va.
dn16:3.47.4: Tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, so akankhamano, ananda, tathagato kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va’ti.
dn16:3.47.5: Evampi kho tvam, ananda, tathagatena olarike nimitte kayiramane olarike obhase kayiramane nasakkhi pativijjhitum, na tathagatam yaci:
dn16:3.47.6: ‘titthatu bhagava kappam, titthatu sugato kappam bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan’ti.
dn16:3.47.7: Sace tvam, ananda, tathagatam yaceyyasi, dveva te vaca tathagato patikkhipeyya, atha tatiyakam adhivaseyya.
dn16:3.48.1: Nanu etam, ananda, maya patikacceva akkhatam:
dn16:3.48.3: Tam kutettha, ananda, labbha, yam tam jatam bhutam sankhatam palokadhammam, tam vata ma palujjiti netam thanam vijjati’.
dn16:3.48.4: Yam kho panetam, ananda, tathagatena cattam vantam muttam pahinam patinissattham ossattho ayusankharo, ekamsena vaca bhasita:
dn16:3.48.6: Ito tinnam masanam accayena tathagato parinibbayissati’ti.
dn16:3.48.7: Tanca tathagato jivitahetu puna paccavamissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
dn16:3.48.9: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:3.49.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmata anandena saddhim yena mahavanam kutagarasala tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:3.49.2: “gaccha tvam, ananda, yavatika bhikkhu vesalim upanissaya viharanti, te sabbe upatthanasalayam sannipatehi”ti.
dn16:3.49.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva yavatika bhikkhu vesalim upanissaya viharanti, te sabbe upatthanasalayam sannipatetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:3.49.4: “sannipatito, bhante, bhikkhusangho, yassadani, bhante, bhagava kalam mannati”ti.
dn16:3.50.1: Atha kho bhagava yenupatthanasala tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
dn16:3.50.3: “tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ye te maya dhamma abhinna desita, te vo sadhukam uggahetva asevitabba bhavetabba bahulikatabba, yathayidam brahmacariyam addhaniyam assa ciratthitikam, tadassa bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
dn16:3.50.4: Katame ca te, bhikkhave, dhamma maya abhinna desita, ye vo sadhukam uggahetva asevitabba bhavetabba bahulikatabba, yathayidam brahmacariyam addhaniyam assa ciratthitikam, tadassa bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
dn16:3.50.5: Seyyathidam—cattaro satipatthana, cattaro sammappadhana, cattaro iddhipada, pancindriyani, panca balani, satta bojjhanga, ariyo atthangiko maggo.
dn16:3.51.1: Ime kho te, bhikkhave, dhamma maya abhinna desita, ye vo sadhukam uggahetva asevitabba bhavetabba bahulikatabba, yathayidam brahmacariyam addhaniyam assa ciratthitikam, tadassa bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan”ti.
dn16:3.51.6: Ito tinnam masanam accayena tathagato parinibbayissati”ti.
dn16:3.51.8: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
dn16:4.1.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya vesalim pindaya pavisi.
dn16:4.1.2: Vesaliyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto nagapalokitam vesalim apaloketva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:4.1.3: “idam pacchimakam, ananda, tathagatassa vesaliya dassanam bhavissati.
dn16:4.1.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:4.2.1: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena bhandagamo tadavasari.
dn16:4.2.4: “catunnam, bhikkhave, dhammanam ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca.
dn16:4.2.6: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, silassa ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca.
dn16:4.2.7: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, samadhissa ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca.
dn16:4.2.8: Ariyaya, bhikkhave, pannaya ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca.
dn16:4.2.9: Ariyaya, bhikkhave, vimuttiya ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca.
dn16:4.2.10: Tayidam, bhikkhave, ariyam silam anubuddham patividdham, ariyo samadhi anubuddho patividdho, ariya panna anubuddha patividdha, ariya vimutti anubuddha patividdha, ucchinna bhavatanha, khina bhavanetti, natthi dani punabbhavo”ti.
dn16:4.3.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
dn16:4.4.1: Tatrapi sudam bhagava bhandagame viharanto etadeva bahulam bhikkhunam dhammim katham karoti:
dn16:4.4.5: Pannaparibhavitam cittam sammadeva asavehi vimuccati, seyyathidam—
dn16:4.5.1: Atha kho bhagava bhandagame yathabhirantam viharitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:4.6.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:4.6.2: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena bhoganagaram tadavasari.
dn16:4.7.1: Tatra sudam bhagava bhoganagare viharati anande cetiye.
dn16:4.7.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
dn16:4.8.2: ‘sammukha metam, avuso, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam,
dn16:4.8.3: ayam dhammo ayam vinayo idam satthusasanan’ti.
dn16:4.8.4: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhasitam neva abhinanditabbam nappatikkositabbam.
dn16:4.8.5: Anabhinanditva appatikkositva tani padabyanjanani sadhukam uggahetva sutte osaretabbani, vinaye sandassetabbani.
dn16:4.8.6: Tani ce sutte osariyamanani vinaye sandassiyamanani na ceva sutte osaranti, na ca vinaye sandissanti, nitthamettha gantabbam:
dn16:4.8.7: ‘addha idam na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanam;
dn16:4.8.10: Tani ce sutte osariyamanani vinaye sandassiyamanani sutte ceva osaranti, vinaye ca sandissanti, nitthamettha gantabbam:
dn16:4.9.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam vadeyya:
dn16:4.9.2: ‘amukasmim nama avase sangho viharati sathero sapamokkho.
dn16:4.9.3: Tassa me sanghassa sammukha sutam sammukha patiggahitam,
dn16:4.9.4: ayam dhammo ayam vinayo idam satthusasanan’ti.
dn16:4.9.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhasitam neva abhinanditabbam nappatikkositabbam.
dn16:4.9.6: Anabhinanditva appatikkositva tani padabyanjanani sadhukam uggahetva sutte osaretabbani, vinaye sandassetabbani.
dn16:4.9.7: Tani ce sutte osariyamanani vinaye sandassiyamanani na ceva sutte osaranti, na ca vinaye sandissanti, nitthamettha gantabbam:
dn16:4.9.8: ‘addha idam na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanam;
dn16:4.9.11: Tani ce sutte osariyamanani vinaye sandassiyamanani sutte ceva osaranti, vinaye ca sandissanti, nitthamettha gantabbam:
dn16:4.10.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam vadeyya:
dn16:4.10.2: ‘amukasmim nama avase sambahula thera bhikkhu viharanti bahussuta agatagama dhammadhara vinayadhara matikadhara.
dn16:4.10.3: Tesam me theranam sammukha sutam sammukha patiggahitam—
dn16:4.10.4: ayam dhammo ayam vinayo idam satthusasanan’ti.
dn16:4.10.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhasitam neva abhinanditabbam …
dn16:4.10.7: na ca vinaye sandissanti, nitthamettha gantabbam:
dn16:4.10.8: ‘addha idam na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanam;
dn16:4.11.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam vadeyya:
dn16:4.11.2: ‘amukasmim nama avase eko thero bhikkhu viharati bahussuto agatagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo matikadharo.
dn16:4.11.3: Tassa me therassa sammukha sutam sammukha patiggahitam—
dn16:4.11.4: ayam dhammo ayam vinayo idam satthusasanan’ti.
dn16:4.11.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhasitam neva abhinanditabbam nappatikkositabbam.
dn16:4.11.6: Anabhinanditva appatikkositva tani padabyanjanani sadhukam uggahetva sutte osaretabbani, vinaye sandassetabbani.
dn16:4.11.7: Tani ce sutte osariyamanani vinaye sandassiyamanani na ceva sutte osaranti, na ca vinaye sandissanti, nitthamettha gantabbam:
dn16:4.11.8: ‘addha idam na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanam;
dn16:4.11.11: Tani ca sutte osariyamanani vinaye sandassiyamanani sutte ceva osaranti, vinaye ca sandissanti, nitthamettha gantabbam:
dn16:4.11.15: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro mahapadese dhareyyatha”ti.
dn16:4.12.1: Tatrapi sudam bhagava bhoganagare viharanto anande cetiye etadeva bahulam bhikkhunam dhammim katham karoti:
dn16:4.12.5: Pannaparibhavitam cittam sammadeva asavehi vimuccati, seyyathidam—
dn16:4.13.1: Atha kho bhagava bhoganagare yathabhirantam viharitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:4.13.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:4.13.4: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena pava tadavasari.
dn16:4.13.5: Tatra sudam bhagava pavayam viharati cundassa kammaraputtassa ambavane.
dn16:4.14.1: Assosi kho cundo kammaraputto: “bhagava kira pavam anuppatto, pavayam viharati mayham ambavane”ti.
dn16:4.14.2: Atha kho cundo kammaraputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
dn16:4.14.3: Ekamantam nisinnam kho cundam kammaraputtam bhagava dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi.
dn16:4.14.4: Atha kho cundo kammaraputto bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassito samadapito samuttejito sampahamsito bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:4.15.1: “adhivasetu me, bhante, bhagava svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
dn16:4.16.1: Atha kho cundo kammaraputto bhagavato adhivasanam viditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
dn16:4.17.1: Atha kho cundo kammaraputto tassa rattiya accayena sake nivesane panitam khadaniyam bhojaniyam patiyadapetva pahutanca sukaramaddavam bhagavato kalam arocapesi:
dn16:4.18.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya saddhim bhikkhusanghena yena cundassa kammaraputtassa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
dn16:4.18.2: Nisajja kho bhagava cundam kammaraputtam amantesi:
dn16:4.18.3: “yam te, cunda, sukaramaddavam patiyattam, tena mam parivisa.
dn16:4.18.4: Yam panannam khadaniyam bhojaniyam patiyattam, tena bhikkhusangham parivisa”ti.
dn16:4.18.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho cundo kammaraputto bhagavato patissutva yam ahosi sukaramaddavam patiyattam, tena bhagavantam parivisi.
dn16:4.18.6: Yam panannam khadaniyam bhojaniyam patiyattam, tena bhikkhusangham parivisi.
dn16:4.19.1: Atha kho bhagava cundam kammaraputtam amantesi:
dn16:4.19.2: “yam te, cunda, sukaramaddavam avasittham, tam sobbhe nikhanahi.
dn16:4.19.3: Naham tam, cunda, passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya, yassa tam paribhuttam samma parinamam gaccheyya annatra tathagatassa”ti.
dn16:4.19.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho cundo kammaraputto bhagavato patissutva yam ahosi sukaramaddavam avasittham, tam sobbhe nikhanitva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
dn16:4.19.5: Ekamantam nisinnam kho cundam kammaraputtam bhagava dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva utthayasana pakkami.
dn16:4.20.1: Atha kho bhagavato cundassa kammaraputtassa bhattam bhuttavissa kharo abadho uppajji, lohitapakkhandika pabalha vedana vattanti maranantika.
dn16:4.20.2: Ta sudam bhagava sato sampajano adhivasesi avihannamano.
dn16:4.20.3: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:4.20.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:4.21.1: Atha kho bhagava magga okkamma yena annataram rukkhamulam tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:4.21.2: “ingha me tvam, ananda, catuggunam sanghatim pannapehi, kilantosmi, ananda, nisidissami”ti.
dn16:4.21.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva catuggunam sanghatim pannapesi.
dn16:4.22.1: Nisajja kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:4.22.2: “ingha me tvam, ananda, paniyam ahara, pipasitosmi, ananda, pivissami”ti.
dn16:4.22.3: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:4.22.4: “idani, bhante, pancamattani sakatasatani atikkantani, tam cakkacchinnam udakam parittam lulitam avilam sandati.
dn16:4.22.5: Ayam, bhante, kakudha nadi avidure acchodaka satodaka sitodaka setodaka suppatittha ramaniya.
dn16:4.22.6: Ettha bhagava paniyanca pivissati, gattani ca siti karissati”ti.
dn16:4.23.1: Dutiyampi kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:4.23.2: “ingha me tvam, ananda, paniyam ahara, pipasitosmi, ananda, pivissami”ti.
dn16:4.23.3: Dutiyampi kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:4.23.4: “idani, bhante, pancamattani sakatasatani atikkantani, tam cakkacchinnam udakam parittam lulitam avilam sandati.
dn16:4.23.5: Ayam, bhante, kakudha nadi avidure acchodaka satodaka sitodaka setodaka suppatittha ramaniya.
dn16:4.23.6: Ettha bhagava paniyanca pivissati, gattani ca sitikarissati”ti.
dn16:4.24.1: Tatiyampi kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:4.24.2: “ingha me tvam, ananda, paniyam ahara, pipasitosmi, ananda, pivissami”ti.
dn16:4.24.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva pattam gahetva yena sa nadika tenupasankami.
dn16:4.24.4: Atha kho sa nadika cakkacchinna paritta lulita avila sandamana, ayasmante anande upasankamante accha vippasanna anavila sandittha.
dn16:4.25.2: “acchariyam vata bho, abbhutam vata bho, tathagatassa mahiddhikata mahanubhavata.
dn16:4.25.3: Ayanhi sa nadika cakkacchinna paritta lulita avila sandamana mayi upasankamante accha vippasanna anavila sandati”ti.
dn16:4.25.4: Pattena paniyam adaya yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:4.25.5: “acchariyam, bhante, abbhutam, bhante, tathagatassa mahiddhikata mahanubhavata.
dn16:4.25.6: Idani sa bhante nadika cakkacchinna paritta lulita avila sandamana mayi upasankamante accha vippasanna anavila sandittha.
dn16:4.25.7: Pivatu bhagava paniyam pivatu sugato paniyan”ti.
dn16:4.26.1: Tena kho pana samayena pukkuso mallaputto alarassa kalamassa savako kusinaraya pavam addhanamaggappatipanno hoti.
dn16:4.26.2: Addasa kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavantam annatarasmim rukkhamule nisinnam.
dn16:4.26.3: Disva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:4.26.4: “acchariyam, bhante, abbhutam, bhante, santena vata, bhante, pabbajita viharena viharanti.
dn16:4.27.1: Bhutapubbam, bhante, alaro kalamo addhanamaggappatipanno magga okkamma avidure annatarasmim rukkhamule divaviharam nisidi.
dn16:4.27.2: Atha kho, bhante, pancamattani sakatasatani alaram kalamam nissaya nissaya atikkamimsu.
dn16:4.27.3: Atha kho, bhante, annataro puriso tassa sakatasatthassa pitthito pitthito agacchanto yena alaro kalamo tenupasankami; upasankamitva alaram kalamam etadavoca:
dn16:4.27.12: ‘So tvam, bhante, sanni samano jagaro pancamattani sakatasatani nissaya nissaya atikkantani neva addasa, na pana saddam assosi;
dn16:4.27.13: apisu te, bhante, sanghati rajena okinna’ti?
dn16:4.27.15: Atha kho, bhante, tassa purisassa etadahosi:
dn16:4.27.16: ‘acchariyam vata bho, abbhutam vata bho, santena vata bho pabbajita viharena viharanti.
dn16:4.27.17: Yatra hi nama sanni samano jagaro pancamattani sakatasatani nissaya nissaya atikkantani neva dakkhati, na pana saddam sossati’ti.
dn16:4.27.18: Alare kalame ularam pasadam pavedetva pakkami”ti.
dn16:4.28.2: katamam nu kho dukkarataram va durabhisambhavataram va—
dn16:4.28.3: yo va sanni samano jagaro pancamattani sakatasatani nissaya nissaya atikkantani neva passeyya, na pana saddam suneyya;
dn16:4.28.4: yo va sanni samano jagaro deve vassante deve galagalayante vijjullatasu niccharantisu asaniya phalantiya neva passeyya, na pana saddam suneyya”ti?
dn16:4.29.1: “Kinhi, bhante, karissanti panca va sakatasatani cha va sakatasatani satta va sakatasatani attha va sakatasatani nava va sakatasatani, sakatasahassam va sakatasatasahassam va.
dn16:4.29.2: Atha kho etadeva dukkarataranceva durabhisambhavataranca yo sanni samano jagaro deve vassante deve galagalayante vijjullatasu niccharantisu asaniya phalantiya neva passeyya, na pana saddam suneyya”ti.
dn16:4.30.2: Tena kho pana samayena deve vassante deve galagalayante vijjullatasu niccharantisu asaniya phalantiya avidure bhusagarassa dve kassaka bhataro hata cattaro ca balibadda.
dn16:4.30.3: Atha kho, pukkusa, atumaya mahajanakayo nikkhamitva yena te dve kassaka bhataro hata cattaro ca balibadda tenupasankami.
dn16:4.31.1: Tena kho panaham, pukkusa, samayena bhusagara nikkhamitva bhusagaradvare abbhokase cankamami.
dn16:4.31.2: Atha kho, pukkusa, annataro puriso tamha mahajanakaya yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thitam kho aham, pukkusa, tam purisam etadavocam:
dn16:4.32.1: ‘kim nu kho eso, avuso, mahajanakayo sannipatito’ti?
dn16:4.32.2: ‘Idani, bhante, deve vassante deve galagalayante vijjullatasu niccharantisu asaniya phalantiya dve kassaka bhataro hata cattaro ca balibadda.
dn16:4.32.14: ‘So tvam, bhante, sanni samano jagaro deve vassante deve galagalayante vijjullatasu niccharantisu asaniya phalantiya neva addasa, na pana saddam assosi’ti?
dn16:4.33.1: Atha kho, pukkusa, tassa purisassa etadahosi:
dn16:4.33.2: ‘acchariyam vata bho, abbhutam vata bho, santena vata bho pabbajita viharena viharanti.
dn16:4.33.3: Yatra hi nama sanni samano jagaro deve vassante deve galagalayante vijjullatasu niccharantisu asaniya phalantiya neva dakkhati, na pana saddam sossati’ti.
dn16:4.33.4: Mayi ularam pasadam pavedetva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami”ti.
dn16:4.34.1: Evam vutte, pukkuso mallaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:4.34.2: “esaham, bhante, yo me alare kalame pasado tam mahavate va ophunami sighasotaya va nadiya pavahemi.
dn16:4.34.4: Seyyathapi, bhante, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhagavata anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
dn16:4.34.5: Esaham, bhante, bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
dn16:4.34.6: Upasakam mam bhagava dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
dn16:4.35.1: Atha kho pukkuso mallaputto annataram purisam amantesi:
dn16:4.35.2: “ingha me tvam, bhane, singivannam yugamattham dharaniyam ahara”ti.
dn16:4.35.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so puriso pukkusassa mallaputtassa patissutva tam singivannam yugamattham dharaniyam ahari.
dn16:4.35.4: Atha kho pukkuso mallaputto tam singivannam yugamattham dharaniyam bhagavato upanamesi:
dn16:4.35.5: “idam, bhante, singivannam yugamattham dharaniyam, tam me bhagava patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
dn16:4.35.6: “Tena hi, pukkusa, ekena mam acchadehi, ekena anandan”ti.
dn16:4.35.7: “Evam, bhante”ti kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavato patissutva ekena bhagavantam acchadeti, ekena ayasmantam anandam.
dn16:4.36.1: Atha kho bhagava pukkusam mallaputtam dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi.
dn16:4.36.2: Atha kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassito samadapito samuttejito sampahamsito utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
dn16:4.37.1: Atha kho ayasma anando acirapakkante pukkuse mallaputte tam singivannam yugamattham dharaniyam bhagavato kayam upanamesi.
dn16:4.37.2: Tam bhagavato kayam upanamitam hataccikam viya khayati.
dn16:4.37.3: Atha kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:4.37.4: “acchariyam, bhante, abbhutam, bhante, yava parisuddho, bhante, tathagatassa chavivanno pariyodato.
dn16:4.37.5: Idam, bhante, singivannam yugamattham dharaniyam bhagavato kayam upanamitam hataccikam viya khayati”ti.
dn16:4.37.6: “Evametam, ananda, evametam, ananda, dvisu kalesu ativiya tathagatassa kayo parisuddho hoti chavivanno pariyodato.
dn16:4.38.2: Yanca, ananda, rattim tathagato anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambujjhati, yanca rattim anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya parinibbayati.
dn16:4.38.3: Imesu kho, ananda, dvisu kalesu ativiya tathagatassa kayo parisuddho hoti chavivanno pariyodato.
dn16:4.38.4: Ajja kho panananda, rattiya pacchime yame kusinarayam upavattane mallanam salavane antarena yamakasalanam tathagatassa parinibbanam bhavissati.
dn16:4.38.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:4.39.1: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena kakudha nadi tenupasankami; upasankamitva kakudham nadim ajjhogahetva nhatva ca pivitva ca paccuttaritva yena ambavanam tenupasankami.
dn16:4.39.3: “ingha me tvam, cundaka, catuggunam sanghatim pannapehi, kilantosmi, cundaka, nipajjissami”ti.
dn16:4.40.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma cundako bhagavato patissutva catuggunam sanghatim pannapesi.
dn16:4.40.2: Atha kho bhagava dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappesi pade padam accadhaya sato sampajano utthanasannam manasikaritva.
dn16:4.40.3: Ayasma pana cundako tattheva bhagavato purato nisidi.
dn16:4.42.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:4.42.2: “siya kho panananda, cundassa kammaraputtassa koci vippatisaram uppadeyya:
dn16:4.42.3: ‘tassa te, avuso cunda, alabha tassa te dulladdham, yassa te tathagato pacchimam pindapatam paribhunjitva parinibbuto’ti.
dn16:4.42.4: Cundassa, ananda, kammaraputtassa evam vippatisaro pativinetabbo:
dn16:4.42.5: ‘tassa te, avuso cunda, labha tassa te suladdham,
dn16:4.42.6: yassa te tathagato pacchimam pindapatam paribhunjitva parinibbuto.
dn16:4.42.7: Sammukha metam, avuso cunda, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
dn16:4.42.8: dveme pindapata samasamaphala samavipaka, ativiya annehi pindapatehi mahapphalatara ca mahanisamsatara ca.
dn16:4.42.10: Yanca pindapatam paribhunjitva tathagato anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambujjhati, yanca pindapatam paribhunjitva tathagato anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya parinibbayati.
dn16:4.42.11: Ime dve pindapata samasamaphala samavipaka, ativiya annehi pindapatehi mahapphalatara ca mahanisamsatara ca.
dn16:4.42.12: Ayusamvattanikam ayasmata cundena kammaraputtena kammam upacitam, vannasamvattanikam ayasmata cundena kammaraputtena kammam upacitam, sukhasamvattanikam ayasmata cundena kammaraputtena kammam upacitam, yasasamvattanikam ayasmata cundena kammaraputtena kammam upacitam, saggasamvattanikam ayasmata cundena kammaraputtena kammam upacitam, adhipateyyasamvattanikam ayasmata cundena kammaraputtena kammam upacitan’ti.
dn16:4.42.13: Cundassa, ananda, kammaraputtassa evam vippatisaro pativinetabbo”ti.
dn16:4.43.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
dn16:5.1.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:5.1.2: “ayamananda, yena hirannavatiya nadiya parimam tiram, yena kusinara upavattanam mallanam salavanam tenupasankamissama”ti.
dn16:5.1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:5.1.4: Atha kho bhagava mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena hirannavatiya nadiya parimam tiram, yena kusinara upavattanam mallanam salavanam tenupasankami. upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:5.1.5: “ingha me tvam, ananda, antarena yamakasalanam uttarasisakam mancakam pannapehi, kilantosmi, ananda, nipajjissami”ti.
dn16:5.1.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva antarena yamakasalanam uttarasisakam mancakam pannapesi.
dn16:5.1.7: Atha kho bhagava dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappesi pade padam accadhaya sato sampajano.
dn16:5.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena yamakasala sabbaphaliphulla honti akalapupphehi.
dn16:5.2.2: Te tathagatassa sariram okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathagatassa pujaya.
dn16:5.2.3: Dibbanipi mandaravapupphani antalikkha papatanti, tani tathagatassa sariram okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathagatassa pujaya.
dn16:5.2.4: Dibbanipi candanacunnani antalikkha papatanti, tani tathagatassa sariram okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathagatassa pujaya.
dn16:5.2.5: Dibbanipi turiyani antalikkhe vajjanti tathagatassa pujaya.
dn16:5.2.6: Dibbanipi sangitani antalikkhe vattanti tathagatassa pujaya.
dn16:5.3.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:5.3.3: Te tathagatassa sariram okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathagatassa pujaya.
dn16:5.3.4: Dibbanipi mandaravapupphani antalikkha papatanti, tani tathagatassa sariram okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathagatassa pujaya.
dn16:5.3.5: Dibbanipi candanacunnani antalikkha papatanti, tani tathagatassa sariram okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathagatassa pujaya.
dn16:5.3.6: Dibbanipi turiyani antalikkhe vajjanti tathagatassa pujaya.
dn16:5.3.7: Dibbanipi sangitani antalikkhe vattanti tathagatassa pujaya.
dn16:5.3.8: Na kho, ananda, ettavata tathagato sakkato va hoti garukato va manito va pujito va apacito va.
dn16:5.3.9: Yo kho, ananda, bhikkhu va bhikkhuni va upasako va upasika va dhammanudhammappatipanno viharati samicippatipanno anudhammacari, so tathagatam sakkaroti garum karoti maneti pujeti apaciyati, paramaya pujaya.
dn16:5.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma upavano bhagavato purato thito hoti bhagavantam bijayamano.
dn16:5.4.2: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam upavanam apasaresi:
dn16:5.4.5: “ayam kho ayasma upavano digharattam bhagavato upatthako santikavacaro samipacari.
dn16:5.4.6: Atha ca pana bhagava pacchime kale ayasmantam upavanam apasareti:
dn16:5.4.8: Ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo, yam bhagava ayasmantam upavanam apasareti:
dn16:5.5.1: Atha kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:5.5.2: “ayam, bhante, ayasma upavano digharattam bhagavato upatthako santikavacaro samipacari.
dn16:5.5.3: Atha ca pana bhagava pacchime kale ayasmantam upavanam apasareti:
dn16:5.5.5: Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yam bhagava ayasmantam upavanam apasareti:
dn16:5.5.7: “Yebhuyyena, ananda, dasasu lokadhatusu devata sannipatita tathagatam dassanaya.
dn16:5.5.8: Yavata, ananda, kusinara upavattanam mallanam salavanam samantato dvadasa yojanani, natthi so padeso valaggakotinittudanamattopi mahesakkhahi devatahi apphuto.
dn16:5.5.11: Kadaci karahaci tathagata loke uppajjanti arahanto sammasambuddha.
dn16:5.5.12: Ajjeva rattiya pacchime yame tathagatassa parinibbanam bhavissati.
dn16:5.5.13: Ayanca mahesakkho bhikkhu bhagavato purato thito ovarento, na mayam labhama pacchime kale tathagatam dassanaya’”ti.
dn16:5.6.2: “Santananda, devata akase pathavisanniniyo kese pakiriya kandanti, baha paggayha kandanti, chinnapatam papatanti, avattanti, vivattanti:
dn16:5.6.3: ‘atikhippam bhagava parinibbayissati, atikhippam sugato parinibbayissati, atikhippam cakkhum loke antaradhayissati’ti.
dn16:5.6.4: Santananda, devata pathaviyam pathavisanniniyo kese pakiriya kandanti, baha paggayha kandanti, chinnapatam papatanti, avattanti, vivattanti:
dn16:5.6.5: ‘atikhippam bhagava parinibbayissati, atikhippam sugato parinibbayissati, atikhippam cakkhum loke antaradhayissati’ti.
dn16:5.6.6: Ya pana ta devata vitaraga, ta sata sampajana adhivasenti:
dn16:5.7.1: “Pubbe, bhante, disasu vassamvuttha bhikkhu agacchanti tathagatam dassanaya.
dn16:5.7.2: Te mayam labhama manobhavaniye bhikkhu dassanaya, labhama payirupasanaya.
dn16:5.7.3: Bhagavato pana mayam, bhante, accayena na labhissama manobhavaniye bhikkhu dassanaya, na labhissama payirupasanaya”ti.
dn16:5.8.1: “Cattarimani, ananda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyani samvejaniyani thanani.
dn16:5.8.3: ‘Idha tathagato jato’ti, ananda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyam samvejaniyam thanam.
dn16:5.8.4: ‘Idha tathagato anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti, ananda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyam samvejaniyam thanam.
dn16:5.8.5: ‘Idha tathagatena anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitan’ti, ananda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyam samvejaniyam thanam.
dn16:5.8.6: ‘Idha tathagato anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya parinibbuto’ti, ananda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyam samvejaniyam thanam.
dn16:5.8.7: Imani kho, ananda, cattari saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyani samvejaniyani thanani.
dn16:5.8.8: Agamissanti kho, ananda, saddha bhikkhu bhikkhuniyo upasaka upasikayo:
dn16:5.8.9: ‘idha tathagato jato’tipi, ‘idha tathagato anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’tipi, ‘idha tathagatena anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitan’tipi, ‘idha tathagato anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya parinibbuto’tipi.
dn16:5.8.10: Ye hi keci, ananda, cetiyacarikam ahindanta pasannacitta kalam karissanti, sabbe te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissanti”ti.
dn16:5.10.3: Ingha tumhe, ananda, saratthe ghatatha anuyunjatha, saratthe appamatta atapino pahitatta viharatha.
dn16:5.10.4: Santananda, khattiyapanditapi brahmanapanditapi gahapatipanditapi tathagate abhippasanna, te tathagatassa sarirapujam karissanti”ti.
dn16:5.11.2: “Yatha kho, ananda, ranno cakkavattissa sarire patipajjanti, evam tathagatassa sarire patipajjitabban”ti.
dn16:5.11.3: “Katham pana, bhante, ranno cakkavattissa sarire patipajjanti”ti?
dn16:5.11.4: “Ranno, ananda, cakkavattissa sariram ahatena vatthena vethenti, ahatena vatthena vethetva vihatena kappasena vethenti, vihatena kappasena vethetva ahatena vatthena vethenti.
dn16:5.11.5: Etenupayena pancahi yugasatehi ranno cakkavattissa sariram vethetva ayasaya teladoniya pakkhipitva annissa ayasaya doniya patikujjitva sabbagandhanam citakam karitva ranno cakkavattissa sariram jhapenti.
dn16:5.11.7: Evam kho, ananda, ranno cakkavattissa sarire patipajjanti.
dn16:5.11.8: Yatha kho, ananda, ranno cakkavattissa sarire patipajjanti, evam tathagatassa sarire patipajjitabbam.
dn16:5.11.10: Tattha ye malam va gandham va cunnakam va aropessanti va abhivadessanti va cittam va pasadessanti tesam tam bhavissati digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
dn16:5.12.3: Tathagato araham sammasambuddho thuparaho, paccekasambuddho thuparaho, tathagatassa savako thuparaho, raja cakkavatti thuparahoti.
dn16:5.12.4: Kincananda, atthavasam paticca tathagato araham sammasambuddho thuparaho?
dn16:5.12.5: ‘Ayam tassa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa thupo’ti, ananda, bahujana cittam pasadenti.
dn16:5.12.6: Te tattha cittam pasadetva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti.
dn16:5.12.7: Idam kho, ananda, atthavasam paticca tathagato araham sammasambuddho thuparaho.
dn16:5.12.9: ‘Ayam tassa bhagavato paccekasambuddhassa thupo’ti, ananda, bahujana cittam pasadenti.
dn16:5.12.10: Te tattha cittam pasadetva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti.
dn16:5.12.11: Idam kho, ananda, atthavasam paticca paccekasambuddho thuparaho.
dn16:5.12.12: Kincananda, atthavasam paticca tathagatassa savako thuparaho?
dn16:5.12.13: ‘Ayam tassa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa savakassa thupo’ti, ananda, bahujana cittam pasadenti.
dn16:5.12.14: Te tattha cittam pasadetva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti.
dn16:5.12.15: Idam kho, ananda, atthavasam paticca tathagatassa savako thuparaho.
dn16:5.12.16: Kincananda, atthavasam paticca raja cakkavatti thuparaho?
dn16:5.12.17: ‘Ayam tassa dhammikassa dhammaranno thupo’ti, ananda, bahujana cittam pasadenti.
dn16:5.12.18: Te tattha cittam pasadetva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti.
dn16:5.12.19: Idam kho, ananda, atthavasam paticca raja cakkavatti thuparaho.
dn16:5.13.1: Atha kho ayasma anando viharam pavisitva kapisisam alambitva rodamano atthasi:
dn16:5.13.2: “ahanca vatamhi sekho sakaraniyo, satthu ca me parinibbanam bhavissati, yo mama anukampako”ti.
dn16:5.13.5: “Eso, bhante, ayasma anando viharam pavisitva kapisisam alambitva rodamano thito:
dn16:5.13.6: ‘ahanca vatamhi sekho sakaraniyo, satthu ca me parinibbanam bhavissati, yo mama anukampako’”ti.
dn16:5.13.7: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
dn16:5.13.8: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena anandam amantehi:
dn16:5.13.10: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
dn16:5.14.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma anando tassa bhikkhuno patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam anandam bhagava etadavoca:
dn16:5.14.2: “alam, ananda, ma soci ma paridevi, nanu etam, ananda, maya patikacceva akkhatam:
dn16:5.14.4: tam kutettha, ananda, labbha. Yam tam jatam bhutam sankhatam palokadhammam, ‘tam vata tathagatassapi sariram ma palujji’ti netam thanam vijjati.
dn16:5.14.5: Digharattam kho te, ananda, tathagato paccupatthito mettena kayakammena hitena sukhena advayena appamanena, mettena vacikammena hitena sukhena advayena appamanena, mettena manokammena hitena sukhena advayena appamanena.
dn16:5.14.6: Katapunnosi tvam, ananda, padhanamanuyunja, khippam hohisi anasavo”ti.
dn16:5.15.2: “yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesum atitamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha, tesampi bhagavantanam etapparamayeva upatthaka ahesum, seyyathapi mayham anando.
dn16:5.15.3: Yepi te, bhikkhave, bhavissanti anagatamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha, tesampi bhagavantanam etapparamayeva upatthaka bhavissanti, seyyathapi mayham anando.
dn16:5.15.6: Janati ‘ayam kalo tathagatam dassanaya upasankamitum bhikkhunam, ayam kalo bhikkhuninam, ayam kalo upasakanam, ayam kalo upasikanam, ayam kalo ranno rajamahamattanam titthiyanam titthiyasavakanan’ti.
dn16:5.16.1: Cattarome, bhikkhave, acchariya abbhuta dhamma anande.
dn16:5.16.3: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisa anandam dassanaya upasankamati, dassanena sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.4: Tatra ce anando dhammam bhasati, bhasitenapi sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.5: Atittava, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisa hoti, atha kho anando tunhi hoti.
dn16:5.16.6: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniparisa anandam dassanaya upasankamati, dassanena sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.7: Tatra ce anando dhammam bhasati, bhasitenapi sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.8: Atittava, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniparisa hoti, atha kho anando tunhi hoti.
dn16:5.16.9: Sace, bhikkhave, upasakaparisa anandam dassanaya upasankamati, dassanena sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.10: Tatra ce anando dhammam bhasati, bhasitenapi sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.11: Atittava, bhikkhave, upasakaparisa hoti, atha kho anando tunhi hoti.
dn16:5.16.12: Sace, bhikkhave, upasikaparisa anandam dassanaya upasankamati, dassanena sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.13: Tatra ce anando dhammam bhasati, bhasitenapi sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.14: Atittava, bhikkhave, upasikaparisa hoti, atha kho anando tunhi hoti.
dn16:5.16.15: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro acchariya abbhuta dhamma anande.
dn16:5.16.16: Cattarome, bhikkhave, acchariya abbhuta dhamma ranne cakkavattimhi.
dn16:5.16.18: Sace, bhikkhave, khattiyaparisa rajanam cakkavattim dassanaya upasankamati, dassanena sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.19: Tatra ce raja cakkavatti bhasati, bhasitenapi sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.20: Atittava, bhikkhave, khattiyaparisa hoti. Atha kho raja cakkavatti tunhi hoti.
dn16:5.16.23: samanaparisa rajanam cakkavattim dassanaya upasankamati, dassanena sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.24: Tatra ce raja cakkavatti bhasati, bhasitenapi sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.25: Atittava, bhikkhave, samanaparisa hoti. Atha kho raja cakkavatti tunhi hoti.
dn16:5.16.26: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cattarome acchariya abbhuta dhamma anande.
dn16:5.16.27: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisa anandam dassanaya upasankamati, dassanena sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.28: Tatra ce anando dhammam bhasati, bhasitenapi sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.33: upasikaparisa anandam dassanaya upasankamati, dassanena sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.34: Tatra ce anando dhammam bhasati, bhasitenapi sa attamana hoti.
dn16:5.16.37: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro acchariya abbhuta dhamma anande”ti.
dn16:5.17.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:5.17.2: “ma, bhante, bhagava imasmim khuddakanagarake ujjangalanagarake sakhanagarake parinibbayi.
dn16:5.17.4: campa rajagaham savatthi saketam kosambi baranasi;
dn16:5.17.6: Ettha bahu khattiyamahasala, brahmanamahasala gahapatimahasala tathagate abhippasanna.
dn16:5.17.8: “ma hevam, ananda, avaca, ma hevam, ananda, avaca:
dn16:5.18.1: Bhutapubbam, ananda, raja mahasudassano nama ahosi cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraja caturanto vijitavi janapadatthavariyappatto sattaratanasamannagato.
dn16:5.18.2: Ranno, ananda, mahasudassanassa ayam kusinara kusavati nama rajadhani ahosi.
dn16:5.18.3: puratthimena ca pacchimena ca dvadasayojanani ayamena; uttarena ca dakkhinena ca sattayojanani vittharena.
dn16:5.18.4: Kusavati, ananda, rajadhani iddha ceva ahosi phita ca bahujana ca akinnamanussa ca subhikkha ca.
dn16:5.18.5: Seyyathapi, ananda, devanam alakamanda nama rajadhani iddha ceva hoti phita ca bahujana ca akinnayakkha ca subhikkha ca;
dn16:5.18.6: evameva kho, ananda, kusavati rajadhani iddha ceva ahosi phita ca bahujana ca akinnamanussa ca subhikkha ca.
dn16:5.18.7: Kusavati, ananda, rajadhani dasahi saddehi avivitta ahosi diva ceva rattinca, seyyathidam—
dn16:5.18.8: hatthisaddena assasaddena rathasaddena bherisaddena mudingasaddena vinasaddena gitasaddena sankhasaddena sammasaddena panitalasaddena ‘asnatha pivatha khadatha’ti dasamena saddena.
dn16:5.19.1: Gaccha tvam, ananda, kusinaram pavisitva kosinarakanam mallanam arocehi:
dn16:5.19.2: ‘ajja kho, vasettha, rattiya pacchime yame tathagatassa parinibbanam bhavissati.
dn16:5.19.5: amhakanca no gamakkhette tathagatassa parinibbanam ahosi, na mayam labhimha pacchime kale tathagatam dassanaya’”ti.
dn16:5.19.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva nivasetva pattacivaramadaya attadutiyo kusinaram pavisi.
dn16:5.20.1: Tena kho pana samayena kosinaraka malla sandhagare sannipatita honti kenacideva karaniyena.
dn16:5.20.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena kosinarakanam mallanam sandhagaram tenupasankami; upasankamitva kosinarakanam mallanam arocesi:
dn16:5.20.3: “ajja kho, vasettha, rattiya pacchime yame tathagatassa parinibbanam bhavissati.
dn16:5.20.6: ‘amhakanca no gamakkhette tathagatassa parinibbanam ahosi, na mayam labhimha pacchime kale tathagatam dassanaya’”ti.
dn16:5.21.1: Idamayasmato anandassa vacanam sutva malla ca mallaputta ca mallasunisa ca mallapajapatiyo ca aghavino dummana cetodukkhasamappita appekacce kese pakiriya kandanti, baha paggayha kandanti, chinnapatam papatanti, avattanti vivattanti:
dn16:5.21.2: “atikhippam bhagava parinibbayissati, atikhippam sugato parinibbayissati, atikhippam cakkhum loke antaradhayissati”ti.
dn16:5.21.3: Atha kho malla ca mallaputta ca mallasunisa ca mallapajapatiyo ca aghavino dummana cetodukkhasamappita yena upavattanam mallanam salavanam yenayasma anando tenupasankamimsu.
dn16:5.22.2: “sace kho aham kosinarake malle ekamekam bhagavantam vandapessami, avandito bhagava kosinarakehi mallehi bhavissati, athayam ratti vibhayissati.
dn16:5.22.3: Yannunaham kosinarake malle kulaparivattaso kulaparivattaso thapetva bhagavantam vandapeyyam:
dn16:5.22.4: ‘itthannamo, bhante, mallo saputto sabhariyo sapariso samacco bhagavato pade sirasa vandati’”ti.
dn16:5.22.5: Atha kho ayasma anando kosinarake malle kulaparivattaso kulaparivattaso thapetva bhagavantam vandapesi:
dn16:5.22.6: “itthannamo, bhante, mallo saputto sabhariyo sapariso samacco bhagavato pade sirasa vandati”ti.
dn16:5.22.7: Atha kho ayasma anando etena upayena pathameneva yamena kosinarake malle bhagavantam vandapesi.
dn16:5.23.1: Tena kho pana samayena subhaddo nama paribbajako kusinarayam pativasati.
dn16:5.23.3: “ajja kira rattiya pacchime yame samanassa gotamassa parinibbanam bhavissati”ti.
dn16:5.23.5: “sutam kho pana metam paribbajakanam vuddhanam mahallakanam acariyapacariyanam bhasamananam:
dn16:5.23.6: ‘kadaci karahaci tathagata loke uppajjanti arahanto sammasambuddha’ti.
dn16:5.23.7: Ajjeva rattiya pacchime yame samanassa gotamassa parinibbanam bhavissati.
dn16:5.23.8: Atthi ca me ayam kankhadhammo uppanno,
dn16:5.23.9: evam pasanno aham samane gotame, ‘pahoti me samano gotamo tatha dhammam desetum, yathaham imam kankhadhammam pajaheyyan’”ti.
dn16:5.24.1: Atha kho subhaddo paribbajako yena upavattanam mallanam salavanam, yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
dn16:5.24.2: “sutam metam, bho ananda, paribbajakanam vuddhanam mahallakanam acariyapacariyanam bhasamananam:
dn16:5.24.3: ‘kadaci karahaci tathagata loke uppajjanti arahanto sammasambuddha’ti.
dn16:5.24.4: Ajjeva rattiya pacchime yame samanassa gotamassa parinibbanam bhavissati.
dn16:5.24.5: Atthi ca me ayam kankhadhammo uppanno—
dn16:5.24.6: evam pasanno aham samane gotame ‘pahoti me samano gotamo tatha dhammam desetum, yathaham imam kankhadhammam pajaheyyan’ti.
dn16:5.24.7: Sadhaham, bho ananda, labheyyam samanam gotamam dassanaya”ti.
dn16:5.24.8: Evam vutte, ayasma anando subhaddam paribbajakam etadavoca:
dn16:5.24.9: “alam, avuso subhadda, ma tathagatam vihethesi, kilanto bhagava”ti.
dn16:5.24.11: tatiyampi kho subhaddo paribbajako ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
dn16:5.24.12: “sutam metam, bho ananda, paribbajakanam vuddhanam mahallakanam acariyapacariyanam bhasamananam:
dn16:5.24.13: ‘kadaci karahaci tathagata loke uppajjanti arahanto sammasambuddha’ti.
dn16:5.24.14: Ajjeva rattiya pacchime yame samanassa gotamassa parinibbanam bhavissati.
dn16:5.24.15: Atthi ca me ayam kankhadhammo uppanno—
dn16:5.24.16: evam pasanno aham samane gotame, ‘pahoti me samano gotamo tatha dhammam desetum, yathaham imam kankhadhammam pajaheyyan’ti.
dn16:5.24.17: Sadhaham, bho ananda, labheyyam samanam gotamam dassanaya”ti.
dn16:5.24.18: Tatiyampi kho ayasma anando subhaddam paribbajakam etadavoca:
dn16:5.24.19: “alam, avuso subhadda, ma tathagatam vihethesi, kilanto bhagava”ti.
dn16:5.25.1: Assosi kho bhagava ayasmato anandassa subhaddena paribbajakena saddhim imam kathasallapam.
dn16:5.25.2: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:5.25.3: “alam, ananda, ma subhaddam varesi, labhatam, ananda, subhaddo tathagatam dassanaya.
dn16:5.25.4: Yam kinci mam subhaddo pucchissati, sabbam tam annapekkhova pucchissati, no vihesapekkho.
dn16:5.25.5: Yancassaham puttho byakarissami, tam khippameva ajanissati”ti.
dn16:5.25.6: Atha kho ayasma anando subhaddam paribbajakam etadavoca:
dn16:5.26.1: Atha kho subhaddo paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi, sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho subhaddo paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:5.26.2: “yeme, bho gotama, samanabrahmana sanghino ganino ganacariya nata yasassino titthakara sadhusammata bahujanassa,
dn16:5.26.3: seyyathidam—purano kassapo, makkhali gosalo, ajito kesakambalo, pakudho kaccayano, sancayo belatthaputto, nigantho nataputto,
dn16:5.26.4: sabbete sakaya patinnaya abbhannimsu, sabbeva na abbhannimsu, udahu ekacce abbhannimsu, ekacce na abbhannimsu”ti?
dn16:5.26.6: ‘sabbete sakaya patinnaya abbhannimsu, sabbeva na abbhannimsu, udahu ekacce abbhannimsu, ekacce na abbhannimsu’ti.
dn16:5.26.9: “Evam, bhante”ti kho subhaddo paribbajako bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:5.27.1: “Yasmim kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo atthangiko maggo na upalabbhati, samanopi tattha na upalabbhati. Dutiyopi tattha samano na upalabbhati. Tatiyopi tattha samano na upalabbhati. Catutthopi tattha samano na upalabbhati.
dn16:5.27.2: Yasminca kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo atthangiko maggo upalabbhati, samanopi tattha upalabbhati, dutiyopi tattha samano upalabbhati, tatiyopi tattha samano upalabbhati, catutthopi tattha samano upalabbhati.
dn16:5.27.3: Imasmim kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo atthangiko maggo upalabbhati, idheva, subhadda, samano, idha dutiyo samano, idha tatiyo samano, idha catuttho samano, sunna parappavada samanebhi annehi.
dn16:5.27.4: Ime ca, subhadda, bhikkhu samma vihareyyum, asunno loko arahantehi assati.
dn16:5.27.15: Ime ca, subhadda, bhikkhu samma vihareyyum, asunno loko arahantehi assa”ti.
dn16:5.28.1: Evam vutte, subhaddo paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:5.28.3: Seyyathapi, bhante, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhagavata anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
dn16:5.28.4: Esaham, bhante, bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
dn16:5.28.5: Labheyyaham, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjam, labheyyam upasampadan”ti.
dn16:5.29.1: “Yo kho, subhadda, annatitthiyapubbo imasmim dhammavinaye akankhati pabbajjam, akankhati upasampadam, so cattaro mase parivasati. Catunnam masanam accayena araddhacitta bhikkhu pabbajenti upasampadenti bhikkhubhavaya.
dn16:5.29.3: “Sace, bhante, annatitthiyapubba imasmim dhammavinaye akankhanta pabbajjam akankhanta upasampadam cattaro mase parivasanti, catunnam masanam accayena araddhacitta bhikkhu pabbajenti upasampadenti bhikkhubhavaya. Aham cattari vassani parivasissami, catunnam vassanam accayena araddhacitta bhikkhu pabbajentu upasampadentu bhikkhubhavaya”ti.
dn16:5.29.4: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:5.29.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
dn16:5.30.1: Atha kho subhaddo paribbajako ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
dn16:5.30.2: “labha vo, avuso ananda; suladdham vo, avuso ananda,
dn16:5.30.3: ye ettha satthu sammukha antevasikabhisekena abhisitta”ti.
dn16:5.30.4: Alattha kho subhaddo paribbajako bhagavato santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
dn16:5.30.5: Acirupasampanno kho panayasma subhaddo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti—tadanuttaram brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
dn16:5.30.6: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
dn16:5.30.7: Annataro kho panayasma subhaddo arahatam ahosi.
dn16:6.1.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:6.1.4: Na kho panetam, ananda, evam datthabbam.
dn16:6.1.5: Yo vo, ananda, maya dhammo ca vinayo ca desito pannatto, so vo mamaccayena sattha.
dn16:6.2.1: Yatha kho panananda, etarahi bhikkhu annamannam avusovadena samudacaranti, na kho mamaccayena evam samudacaritabbam.
dn16:6.2.2: Theratarena, ananda, bhikkhuna navakataro bhikkhu namena va gottena va avusovadena va samudacaritabbo.
dn16:6.2.3: Navakatarena bhikkhuna therataro bhikkhu ‘bhante’ti va ‘ayasma’ti va samudacaritabbo.
dn16:6.3.1: Akankhamano, ananda, sangho mamaccayena khuddanukhuddakani sikkhapadani samuhanatu.
dn16:6.4.1: Channassa, ananda, bhikkhuno mamaccayena brahmadando databbo”ti.
dn16:6.4.3: “Channo, ananda, bhikkhu yam iccheyya, tam vadeyya.
dn16:6.4.4: So bhikkhuhi neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo, na anusasitabbo”ti.
dn16:6.5.2: “siya kho pana, bhikkhave, ekabhikkhussapi kankha va vimati va buddhe va dhamme va sanghe va magge va patipadaya va, pucchatha, bhikkhave, ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha:
dn16:6.5.3: ‘sammukhibhuto no sattha ahosi, na mayam sakkhimha bhagavantam sammukha patipucchitun’”ti.
dn16:6.5.4: Evam vutte, te bhikkhu tunhi ahesum.
dn16:6.6.3: “siya kho pana, bhikkhave, ekabhikkhussapi kankha va vimati va buddhe va dhamme va sanghe va magge va patipadaya va, pucchatha, bhikkhave, ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha:
dn16:6.6.4: ‘sammukhibhuto no sattha ahosi, na mayam sakkhimha bhagavantam sammukha patipucchitun’”ti.
dn16:6.6.5: Tatiyampi kho te bhikkhu tunhi ahesum.
dn16:6.6.7: “siya kho pana, bhikkhave, satthugaravenapi na puccheyyatha. Sahayakopi, bhikkhave, sahayakassa arocetu”ti.
dn16:6.6.8: Evam vutte, te bhikkhu tunhi ahesum.
dn16:6.6.9: Atha kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn16:6.6.10: “acchariyam, bhante, abbhutam, bhante, evam pasanno aham, bhante, imasmim bhikkhusanghe, ‘natthi ekabhikkhussapi kankha va vimati va buddhe va dhamme va sanghe va magge va patipadaya va’”ti.
dn16:6.6.11: “Pasada kho tvam, ananda, vadesi, nanameva hettha, ananda, tathagatassa. Natthi imasmim bhikkhusanghe ekabhikkhussapi kankha va vimati va buddhe va dhamme va sanghe va magge va patipadaya va.
dn16:6.6.12: Imesanhi, ananda, pancannam bhikkhusatanam yo pacchimako bhikkhu, so sotapanno avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
dn16:6.8.1: Atha kho bhagava pathamam jhanam samapajji, pathamajjhana vutthahitva dutiyam jhanam samapajji, dutiyajjhana vutthahitva tatiyam jhanam samapajji, tatiyajjhana vutthahitva catuttham jhanam samapajji, catutthajjhana vutthahitva akasanancayatanam samapajji, akasanancayatanasamapattiya vutthahitva vinnanancayatanam samapajji, vinnanancayatanasamapattiya vutthahitva akincannayatanam samapajji, akincannayatanasamapattiya vutthahitva nevasannanasannayatanam samapajji, nevasannanasannayatanasamapattiya vutthahitva sannavedayitanirodham samapajji.
dn16:6.8.2: Atha kho ayasma anando ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
dn16:6.9.1: Atha kho bhagava sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthahitva nevasannanasannayatanam samapajji, nevasannanasannayatanasamapattiya vutthahitva akincannayatanam samapajji, akincannayatanasamapattiya vutthahitva vinnanancayatanam samapajji, vinnanancayatanasamapattiya vutthahitva akasanancayatanam samapajji, akasanancayatanasamapattiya vutthahitva catuttham jhanam samapajji, catutthajjhana vutthahitva tatiyam jhanam samapajji, tatiyajjhana vutthahitva dutiyam jhanam samapajji, dutiyajjhana vutthahitva pathamam jhanam samapajji, pathamajjhana vutthahitva dutiyam jhanam samapajji, dutiyajjhana vutthahitva tatiyam jhanam samapajji, tatiyajjhana vutthahitva catuttham jhanam samapajji, catutthajjhana vutthahitva samanantara bhagava parinibbayi.
dn16:6.10.1: Parinibbute bhagavati saha parinibbana mahabhumicalo ahosi bhimsanako salomahamso. Devadundubhiyo ca phalimsu.
dn16:6.10.2: Parinibbute bhagavati saha parinibbana brahmasahampati imam gatham abhasi:
dn16:6.10.9: Parinibbute bhagavati saha parinibbana sakko devanamindo imam gatham abhasi:
dn16:6.10.14: Parinibbute bhagavati saha parinibbana ayasma anuruddho ima gathayo abhasi:
dn16:6.10.23: Parinibbute bhagavati saha parinibbana ayasma anando imam gatham abhasi:
dn16:6.10.28: Parinibbute bhagavati ye te tattha bhikkhu avitaraga appekacce baha paggayha kandanti, chinnapatam papatanti, avattanti vivattanti, “atikhippam bhagava parinibbuto, atikhippam sugato parinibbuto, atikhippam cakkhum loke antarahito”ti.
dn16:6.10.29: Ye pana te bhikkhu vitaraga, te sata sampajana adhivasenti:
dn16:6.11.1: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho bhikkhu amantesi:
dn16:6.11.3: Nanu etam, avuso, bhagavata patikacceva akkhatam:
dn16:6.11.5: Tam kutettha, avuso, labbha. ‘Yam tam jatam bhutam sankhatam palokadhammam, tam vata ma palujji’ti, netam thanam vijjati.
dn16:6.11.7: “Kathambhuta pana, bhante, ayasma anuruddho devata manasi karoti”ti?
dn16:6.11.8: “Santavuso ananda, devata akase pathavisanniniyo kese pakiriya kandanti, baha paggayha kandanti, chinnapatam papatanti, avattanti, vivattanti:
dn16:6.11.9: ‘atikhippam bhagava parinibbuto, atikhippam sugato parinibbuto, atikhippam cakkhum loke antarahito’ti.
dn16:6.11.10: Santavuso ananda, devata pathaviya pathavisanniniyo kese pakiriya kandanti, baha paggayha kandanti, chinnapatam papatanti, avattanti, vivattanti:
dn16:6.11.11: ‘atikhippam bhagava parinibbuto, atikhippam sugato parinibbuto, atikhippam cakkhum loke antarahito’ti.
dn16:6.11.12: Ya pana ta devata vitaraga, ta sata sampajana adhivasenti:
dn16:6.11.14: Atha kho ayasma ca anuruddho ayasma ca anando tam rattavasesam dhammiya kathaya vitinamesum.
dn16:6.12.1: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
dn16:6.12.2: “gacchavuso ananda, kusinaram pavisitva kosinarakanam mallanam arocehi:
dn16:6.12.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando ayasmato anuruddhassa patissutva pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya attadutiyo kusinaram pavisi.
dn16:6.12.6: Tena kho pana samayena kosinaraka malla sandhagare sannipatita honti teneva karaniyena.
dn16:6.12.7: Atha kho ayasma anando yena kosinarakanam mallanam sandhagaram tenupasankami; upasankamitva kosinarakanam mallanam arocesi:
dn16:6.12.10: Idamayasmato anandassa vacanam sutva malla ca mallaputta ca mallasunisa ca mallapajapatiyo ca aghavino dummana cetodukkhasamappita appekacce kese pakiriya kandanti, baha paggayha kandanti, chinnapatam papatanti, avattanti, vivattanti:
dn16:6.12.11: “atikhippam bhagava parinibbuto, atikhippam sugato parinibbuto, atikhippam cakkhum loke antarahito”ti.
dn16:6.13.1: Atha kho kosinaraka malla purise anapesum:
dn16:6.13.2: “tena hi, bhane, kusinarayam gandhamalanca sabbanca talavacaram sannipatetha”ti.
dn16:6.13.3: Atha kho kosinaraka malla gandhamalanca sabbanca talavacaram panca ca dussayugasatani adaya yena upavattanam mallanam salavanam, yena bhagavato sariram tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavato sariram naccehi gitehi vaditehi malehi gandhehi sakkaronta garum karonta manenta pujenta celavitanani karonta mandalamale patiyadenta ekadivasam vitinamesum.
dn16:6.13.5: “ativikalo kho ajja bhagavato sariram jhapetum, sve dani mayam bhagavato sariram jhapessama”ti.
dn16:6.13.6: Atha kho kosinaraka malla bhagavato sariram naccehi gitehi vaditehi malehi gandhehi sakkaronta garum karonta manenta pujenta celavitanani karonta mandalamale patiyadenta dutiyampi divasam vitinamesum, tatiyampi divasam vitinamesum, catutthampi divasam vitinamesum, pancamampi divasam vitinamesum, chatthampi divasam vitinamesum.
dn16:6.14.1: Atha kho sattamam divasam kosinarakanam mallanam etadahosi:
dn16:6.14.2: “mayam bhagavato sariram naccehi gitehi vaditehi malehi gandhehi sakkaronta garum karonta manenta pujenta dakkhinena dakkhinam nagarassa haritva bahirena bahiram dakkhinato nagarassa bhagavato sariram jhapessama”ti.
dn16:6.14.3: Tena kho pana samayena attha mallapamokkha sisamnhata ahatani vatthani nivattha:
dn16:6.14.4: “mayam bhagavato sariram uccaressama”ti na sakkonti uccaretum.
dn16:6.14.5: Atha kho kosinaraka malla ayasmantam anuruddham etadavocum:
dn16:6.14.6: “ko nu kho, bhante anuruddha, hetu ko paccayo, yenime attha mallapamokkha sisamnhata ahatani vatthani nivattha:
dn16:6.14.7: ‘mayam bhagavato sariram uccaressama’ti na sakkonti uccaretun”ti?
dn16:6.14.8: “Annatha kho, vasettha, tumhakam adhippayo, annatha devatanam adhippayo”ti.
dn16:6.15.3: ‘mayam bhagavato sariram naccehi gitehi vaditehi malehi gandhehi sakkaronta garum karonta manenta pujenta dakkhinena dakkhinam nagarassa haritva bahirena bahiram dakkhinato nagarassa bhagavato sariram jhapessama’ti;
dn16:6.15.5: ‘mayam bhagavato sariram dibbehi naccehi gitehi vaditehi malehi gandhehi sakkaronta garum karonta manenta pujenta uttarena uttaram nagarassa haritva uttarena dvarena nagaram pavesetva majjhena majjham nagarassa haritva puratthimena dvarena nikkhamitva puratthimato nagarassa makutabandhanam nama mallanam cetiyam ettha bhagavato sariram jhapessama’”ti.
dn16:6.16.1: Tena kho pana samayena kusinara yava sandhisamalasankatira jannumattena odhina mandaravapupphehi santhata hoti.
dn16:6.16.2: Atha kho devata ca kosinaraka ca malla bhagavato sariram dibbehi ca manusakehi ca naccehi gitehi vaditehi malehi gandhehi sakkaronta garum karonta manenta pujenta uttarena uttaram nagarassa haritva uttarena dvarena nagaram pavesetva majjhena majjham nagarassa haritva puratthimena dvarena nikkhamitva puratthimato nagarassa makutabandhanam nama mallanam cetiyam ettha ca bhagavato sariram nikkhipimsu.
dn16:6.17.1: Atha kho kosinaraka malla ayasmantam anandam etadavocum:
dn16:6.17.2: “katham mayam, bhante ananda, tathagatassa sarire patipajjama”ti?
dn16:6.17.3: “Yatha kho, vasettha, ranno cakkavattissa sarire patipajjanti, evam tathagatassa sarire patipajjitabban”ti.
dn16:6.17.4: “Katham pana, bhante ananda, ranno cakkavattissa sarire patipajjanti”ti?
dn16:6.17.5: “Ranno, vasettha, cakkavattissa sariram ahatena vatthena vethenti, ahatena vatthena vethetva vihatena kappasena vethenti, vihatena kappasena vethetva ahatena vatthena vethenti.
dn16:6.17.6: Etena upayena pancahi yugasatehi ranno cakkavattissa sariram vethetva ayasaya teladoniya pakkhipitva annissa ayasaya doniya patikujjitva sabbagandhanam citakam karitva ranno cakkavattissa sariram jhapenti.
dn16:6.17.8: Evam kho, vasettha, ranno cakkavattissa sarire patipajjanti.
dn16:6.17.9: Yatha kho, vasettha, ranno cakkavattissa sarire patipajjanti, evam tathagatassa sarire patipajjitabbam.
dn16:6.17.11: Tattha ye malam va gandham va cunnakam va aropessanti va abhivadessanti va cittam va pasadessanti, tesam tam bhavissati digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
dn16:6.18.1: Atha kho kosinaraka malla purise anapesum:
dn16:6.18.2: “tena hi, bhane, mallanam vihatam kappasam sannipatetha”ti.
dn16:6.18.3: Atha kho kosinaraka malla bhagavato sariram ahatena vatthena vethetva vihatena kappasena vethesum, vihatena kappasena vethetva ahatena vatthena vethesum.
dn16:6.18.4: Etena upayena pancahi yugasatehi bhagavato sariram vethetva ayasaya teladoniya pakkhipitva annissa ayasaya doniya patikujjitva sabbagandhanam citakam karitva bhagavato sariram citakam aropesum.
dn16:6.19.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahakassapo pavaya kusinaram addhanamaggappatipanno hoti mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim pancamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
dn16:6.19.2: Atha kho ayasma mahakassapo magga okkamma annatarasmim rukkhamule nisidi.
dn16:6.19.3: Tena kho pana samayena annataro ajivako kusinaraya mandaravapuppham gahetva pavam addhanamaggappatipanno hoti.
dn16:6.19.4: Addasa kho ayasma mahakassapo tam ajivakam duratova agacchantam, disva tam ajivakam etadavoca:
dn16:6.19.8: Tattha ye te bhikkhu avitaraga appekacce baha paggayha kandanti, chinnapatam papatanti, avattanti, vivattanti:
dn16:6.19.9: “atikhippam bhagava parinibbuto, atikhippam sugato parinibbuto, atikhippam cakkhum loke antarahito”ti.
dn16:6.19.10: Ye pana te bhikkhu vitaraga, te sata sampajana adhivasenti:
dn16:6.20.1: Tena kho pana samayena subhaddo nama vuddhapabbajito tassam parisayam nisinno hoti.
dn16:6.20.2: Atha kho subhaddo vuddhapabbajito te bhikkhu etadavoca:
dn16:6.20.3: “alam, avuso, ma socittha, ma paridevittha, sumutta mayam tena mahasamanena. Upadduta ca homa:
dn16:6.20.4: ‘idam vo kappati, idam vo na kappati’ti.
dn16:6.20.5: Idani pana mayam yam icchissama, tam karissama, yam na icchissama, na tam karissama”ti.
dn16:6.20.6: Atha kho ayasma mahakassapo bhikkhu amantesi:
dn16:6.20.8: Nanu etam, avuso, bhagavata patikacceva akkhatam:
dn16:6.20.10: Tam kutettha, avuso, labbha. ‘Yam tam jatam bhutam sankhatam palokadhammam, tam tathagatassapi sariram ma palujji’ti, netam thanam vijjati”ti.
dn16:6.21.1: Tena kho pana samayena cattaro mallapamokkha sisamnhata ahatani vatthani nivattha:
dn16:6.21.2: “mayam bhagavato citakam alimpessama”ti na sakkonti alimpetum.
dn16:6.21.3: Atha kho kosinaraka malla ayasmantam anuruddham etadavocum:
dn16:6.21.4: “ko nu kho, bhante anuruddha, hetu ko paccayo, yenime cattaro mallapamokkha sisamnhata ahatani vatthani nivattha:
dn16:6.21.5: ‘mayam bhagavato citakam alimpessama’ti na sakkonti alimpetun”ti?
dn16:6.21.9: ‘ayam ayasma mahakassapo pavaya kusinaram addhanamaggappatipanno mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim pancamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
dn16:6.21.10: Na tava bhagavato citako pajjalissati, yavayasma mahakassapo bhagavato pade sirasa na vandissati’”ti.
dn16:6.22.1: Atha kho ayasma mahakassapo yena kusinara makutabandhanam nama mallanam cetiyam, yena bhagavato citako tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamsam civaram katva anjalim panametva tikkhattum citakam padakkhinam katva bhagavato pade sirasa vandi.
dn16:6.22.2: Tanipi kho pancabhikkhusatani ekamsam civaram katva anjalim panametva tikkhattum citakam padakkhinam katva bhagavato pade sirasa vandimsu.
dn16:6.22.3: Vandite ca panayasmata mahakassapena tehi ca pancahi bhikkhusatehi sayameva bhagavato citako pajjali.
dn16:6.23.1: Jhayamanassa kho pana bhagavato sarirassa yam ahosi chaviti va cammanti va mamsanti va nharuti va lasikati va, tassa neva charika pannayittha, na masi;
dn16:6.23.3: Seyyathapi nama sappissa va telassa va jhayamanassa neva charika pannayati, na masi;
dn16:6.23.4: evameva bhagavato sarirassa jhayamanassa yam ahosi chaviti va cammanti va mamsanti va nharuti va lasikati va, tassa neva charika pannayittha, na masi;
dn16:6.23.6: Tesanca pancannam dussayugasatanam dveva dussani na dayhimsu yanca sabbaabbhantarimam yanca bahiram.
dn16:6.23.7: Daddhe ca kho pana bhagavato sarire antalikkha udakadhara patubhavitva bhagavato citakam nibbapesi.
dn16:6.23.9: Kosinarakapi malla sabbagandhodakena bhagavato citakam nibbapesum.
dn16:6.23.10: Atha kho kosinaraka malla bhagavato sarirani sattaham sandhagare sattipanjaram karitva dhanupakaram parikkhipapetva naccehi gitehi vaditehi malehi gandhehi sakkarimsu garum karimsu manesum pujesum.
dn16:6.24.1: Assosi kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto:
dn16:6.24.3: Atha kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto kosinarakanam mallanam dutam pahesi:
dn16:6.24.4: “bhagavapi khattiyo ahampi khattiyo, ahampi arahami bhagavato sariranam bhagam, ahampi bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca karissami”ti.
dn16:6.24.7: Atha kho vesalika licchavi kosinarakanam mallanam dutam pahesum:
dn16:6.24.8: “bhagavapi khattiyo mayampi khattiya, mayampi arahama bhagavato sariranam bhagam, mayampi bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca karissama”ti.
dn16:6.24.11: Atha kho kapilavatthuvasi sakya kosinarakanam mallanam dutam pahesum:
dn16:6.24.12: “bhagava amhakam natisettho, mayampi arahama bhagavato sariranam bhagam, mayampi bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca karissama”ti.
dn16:6.24.15: Atha kho allakappaka bulayo kosinarakanam mallanam dutam pahesum:
dn16:6.24.16: “bhagavapi khattiyo mayampi khattiya, mayampi arahama bhagavato sariranam bhagam, mayampi bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca karissama”ti.
dn16:6.24.19: Atha kho ramagamaka koliya kosinarakanam mallanam dutam pahesum:
dn16:6.24.20: “bhagavapi khattiyo mayampi khattiya, mayampi arahama bhagavato sariranam bhagam, mayampi bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca karissama”ti.
dn16:6.24.23: Atha kho vetthadipako brahmano kosinarakanam mallanam dutam pahesi:
dn16:6.24.24: “bhagavapi khattiyo ahampismi brahmano, ahampi arahami bhagavato sariranam bhagam, ahampi bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca karissami”ti.
dn16:6.24.27: Atha kho paveyyaka malla kosinarakanam mallanam dutam pahesum:
dn16:6.24.28: “bhagavapi khattiyo mayampi khattiya, mayampi arahama bhagavato sariranam bhagam, mayampi bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca karissama”ti.
dn16:6.25.1: Evam vutte, kosinaraka malla te sanghe gane etadavocum:
dn16:6.25.2: “bhagava amhakam gamakkhette parinibbuto, na mayam dassama bhagavato sariranam bhagan”ti.
dn16:6.25.3: Evam vutte, dono brahmano te sanghe gane etadavoca:
dn16:6.25.12: “Tena hi, brahmana, tvanneva bhagavato sarirani atthadha samam savibhattam vibhajahi”ti.
dn16:6.25.13: “Evam, bho”ti kho dono brahmano tesam sanghanam gananam patissutva bhagavato sarirani atthadha samam suvibhattam vibhajitva te sanghe gane etadavoca:
dn16:6.25.14: “imam me bhonto tumbam dadantu ahampi tumbassa thupanca mahanca karissami”ti.
dn16:6.25.15: Adamsu kho te donassa brahmanassa tumbam.
dn16:6.26.3: Atha kho pippalivaniya moriya kosinarakanam mallanam dutam pahesum:
dn16:6.26.4: “bhagavapi khattiyo mayampi khattiya, mayampi arahama bhagavato sariranam bhagam, mayampi bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca karissama”ti.
dn16:6.26.5: “Natthi bhagavato sariranam bhago, vibhattani bhagavato sarirani.
dn16:6.27.1: Atha kho raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto rajagahe bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca akasi.
dn16:6.27.2: Vesalikapi licchavi vesaliyam bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca akamsu.
dn16:6.27.3: Kapilavatthuvasipi sakya kapilavatthusmim bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca akamsu.
dn16:6.27.4: Allakappakapi bulayo allakappe bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca akamsu.
dn16:6.27.5: Ramagamakapi koliya ramagame bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca akamsu.
dn16:6.27.6: Vetthadipakopi brahmano vetthadipe bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca akasi.
dn16:6.27.7: Paveyyakapi malla pavayam bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca akamsu.
dn16:6.27.8: Kosinarakapi malla kusinarayam bhagavato sariranam thupanca mahanca akamsu.
dn16:6.27.9: Donopi brahmano tumbassa thupanca mahanca akasi.
dn16:6.27.10: Pippalivaniyapi moriya pippalivane angaranam thupanca mahanca akamsu.
dn16:6.27.11: Iti attha sarirathupa navamo tumbathupo dasamo angarathupo.
